Items.descriptionContentEn: Conveniently located near Hang Hau MTR station and the accompanying public transport interchange, Nan Fun Plaza offers shopping, dining, health & beauty as well as education and other services. It is a convenient hub for Nan Fung’s residents as well as those living in the Tseung Kwan O area. Whether it’s shopping for fashion and household necessities, enriching children with various arts and language classes, or enjoying an evening meal with family, Nan Fung Plaza is a great place to spend time with friends and loved ones.
Items.descriptionContentTc: 南豐廣場鄰近坑口地鐵站和公共運輸交匯處，為顧客提供購物、餐飲、健康美容和教育服務等，是南豐和將軍澳居民的聚點。無論是購買時裝或家庭用品、讓孩子上美術和語言班、或和家人享受一頓晚餐，南豐廣場都是一個讓您跟朋友和親人消磨時間的理想地。
Items.descriptionContentSc: 南丰广场邻近坑口地铁站和公共运输交汇处，为顾客提供购物、餐饮、健康美容和教育服务等，是南丰和将军澳居民的聚点。无论是购买时装或家庭用品、让孩子上美术和语言班、或和家人享受一顿晚餐，南丰广场都是一个让您跟朋友和亲人消磨时间的理想地。

parkingInfoList.promotionPrivilegeDescriptionEn:
From Monday to Sunday, from 10:00 am to 9:30 pm (according to vehicle entry time), "Link Up" members can enjoy 2 hour free parking by using at most 3 machine printed receipt from shopping centre and or wet market (if applicable) with total spending of $300 or more at the related Car Parks. (*Shopper must present member ID in "Link UP" Apps to enjoy the above offer)

*The offer is eligible for private cars only, cannot be used together with other privilege
*Customer is required to present the original cardholder copy of electronic payment (including EPS, credit card, Octopus & etc) receipts
*Free parking is extended for 2 extra hour for hourly patrons who are eligible for our free parking program by spending up to a designated amount provided that one of the receipts presented is issued by any food and beverage tenants of the Shopping Mall
*Subject to the terms and conditions


The car parks are subject to user restrictions under the relevant government lease and / or deed of mutual covenants, for details, please observe the conditions of parking and any changes or additions thereto imposed from time to time displayed at the entrance of the relevant car park.
parkingInfoList.promotionPrivilegeDescriptionTc:
逢星期一至日，早上10時至晚上9時半（以入車時間計算），「Link Up」會員憑商場或街市(如適用)發出之即日機印發票最多3張並購物消費滿$300或以上，即可享有2小時免費泊車優惠。(*必須出示『Link UP』應用程式中的會員編號，方可享以上優惠)

*優惠祇適用於私家車，不可以與其他形式的泊車優惠同時使用
*顧客必須出示相關之電子貨幣〈包括易辦事、信用卡、八達通等〉付款存根正本〈持卡人存根〉
*顧客參加本商場消費泊車優惠滿指定金額，其中一張消費單據由商場內任何一所食肆簽發，即可享額外2小時免費泊車優惠
*受條款及細則限制


停車場使用者受地契及／或大厦公契條款約束, 詳情請參閱個別停車場入口所展示的各項泊車條款及其後之變更。
parkingInfoList.promotionPrivilegeDescriptionSc:
逢星期一至日，早上10时至晚上9时半（以入车时间计算），「Link Up」会员凭商场或街市(如适用)发出之即日机印发票最多3张并购物消费满$300或以上，即可享有2小时免费泊车优惠。(*必须出示『Link UP』应用程式中的会员编号，方可享以上优惠)

*优惠只适用於私家车，不可以与其他形式的泊车优惠同时使用
*顾客必须出示相关之电子货币〈包括易办事、信用卡、八达通等〉付款存根正本〈持卡人存根〉
*顾客参加本商场消费泊车优惠满指定金额，其中一张消费单据由商场内任何一所食肆签发，即可享额外2小时免费泊车优惠
*受条款及细则限制


停车场使用者受地契及／或大厦公契条款约束, 详情请参阅个别停车场入口所展示的各项泊车条款及其後之变更。

"EV Park" Electric Vehicle Free Parking Privilege

 

Registered EV shall enjoy free parking privilege for the particular EV at certain participating car parks upon any amount of spending with machine-printed receipt under the portfolio of Link, from 10am to 10pm daily.



*The offer is eligible for private cars only, cannot be used together with other privilege

Items.descriptionContentEn: After a $200 million transformation in 2012, Leung King Plaza in Tuen Mun is now a leisure hub for the area's residents. Conveniently located by a light rail station, Leung King Plaza is a model for an "eco-plaza" concept, which preserves existing green elements, incorporates new green features, natural light, and landscaping. Existing trees were well preserved, while new timber decking, benches and planters were added in the courtyard and terrace. These are just a few enhancements that have made Leung King Plaza a more natural, comfortable and relaxing shopping experience. In addition to the plentiful shops, restaurants, and service providers that fill the spacious 384,800 square feet plaza, there are around 616 parking spaces for visitors’ convenience.
Items.descriptionContentTc: 2012年，經過2億港元的優化工程後，良景廣場成為屯門區內居民的購物休閒新聚點。鄰近輕鐵站的良景廣場根據「生態商場」的概念，保留原有綠化元素，同時融合了新的綠化設計，採集自然光和美化景觀。除原有的樹木得以保全外，庭園和平台上還增添了全新的木製露天平台、長椅和花架。這些改善工程，令良景廣場更接近大自然、更舒適，帶來更悠閒的購物體驗。商場面積達384,800平方呎，除了多種類型的商店、食肆和其它服務外， 更有616個泊車位，令購物更加方便
Items.descriptionContentSc: 2012年，经过2亿港元的优化工程後，良景广场成为屯门区内居民的购物休闲新聚点。邻近轻铁站的良景广场根据「生态商场」的概念，保留原有绿化元素，同时融合了新的绿化设计，采集自然光和美化景观。除原有的树木得以保全外，庭园和平台上还增添了全新的木制露天平台、长椅和花架。这些改善工程，令良景广场更接近大自然、更舒适，带来更悠闲的购物体验。商场面积达384,800平方尺，除了多种类型的商店、食肆和其它服务外， 更有616个泊车位，令购物更加方便

parkingInfoList.promotionPrivilegeDescriptionEn:
From Monday to Sunday, from 10:00 am to 9:30 pm (according to vehicle entry time), "Link Up" members can enjoy 2 hour free parking by using at most 3 machine printed receipt from shopping centre and or wet market (if applicable) with total spending of $300 or more at the related Car Parks. (*Shopper must present member ID in "Link UP" Apps to enjoy the above offer)

*The offer is eligible for private cars only, cannot be used together with other privilege
*Customer is required to present the original cardholder copy of electronic payment (including EPS, credit card, Octopus & etc) receipts
*Free parking is extended for 2 extra hour for hourly patrons who are eligible for our free parking program by spending up to a designated amount provided that one of the receipts presented is issued by any food and beverage tenants of the Shopping Mall
*Subject to the terms and conditions


The car parks are subject to user restrictions under the relevant government lease and / or deed of mutual covenants, for details, please observe the conditions of parking and any changes or additions thereto imposed from time to time displayed at the entrance of the relevant car park.
parkingInfoList.promotionPrivilegeDescriptionTc:
逢星期一至日，早上10時至晚上9時半（以入車時間計算），「Link Up」會員憑商場或街市(如適用)發出之即日機印發票最多3張並購物消費滿$300或以上，即可享有2小時免費泊車優惠。(*必須出示『Link UP』應用程式中的會員編號，方可享以上優惠)

*優惠祇適用於私家車，不可以與其他形式的泊車優惠同時使用
*顧客必須出示相關之電子貨幣〈包括易辦事、信用卡、八達通等〉付款存根正本〈持卡人存根〉
*顧客參加本商場消費泊車優惠滿指定金額，其中一張消費單據由商場內任何一所食肆簽發，即可享額外2小時免費泊車優惠
*受條款及細則限制


停車場使用者受地契及／或大厦公契條款約束, 詳情請參閱個別停車場入口所展示的各項泊車條款及其後之變更。
parkingInfoList.promotionPrivilegeDescriptionSc:
逢星期一至日，早上10时至晚上9时半（以入车时间计算），「Link Up」会员凭商场或街市(如适用)发出之即日机印发票最多3张并购物消费满$300或以上，即可享有2小时免费泊车优惠。(*必须出示『Link UP』应用程式中的会员编号，方可享以上优惠)

*优惠只适用於私家车，不可以与其他形式的泊车优惠同时使用
*顾客必须出示相关之电子货币〈包括易办事、信用卡、八达通等〉付款存根正本〈持卡人存根〉
*顾客参加本商场消费泊车优惠满指定金额，其中一张消费单据由商场内任何一所食肆签发，即可享额外2小时免费泊车优惠

Items.descriptionTitleEn: "With two sections of the shopping centre connected by a footbridge, Temple Mall is situated in the midst of one of Hong Kong’s most iconic and frequented landmarks - Wong Tai Sin Temple with direct access from Wong Tai Sin MTR station as well as convenient access by other modes of public transportation."
Items.descriptionTitleTc: "黃大仙中心毗鄰香港最具代表性的旅遊熱點 - 黃大仙廟，接連港鐵站，亦鄰近其它交通工具。"
Items.descriptionTitleSc: "黄大仙中心毗邻香港最具代表性的旅游热点 - 黄大仙庙，接连港铁站，亦邻近其它交通工具。"
Items.descriptionContentEn: Comprising the former Temple Mall North (formerly known as Lung Cheung Mall) and Temple Mall South (formerly known as Wong Tai Sin Plaza), this regional centre features diverse retail offerings and an enhanced shopping environment, offering a complete shopping experience for the community’s residents as well as local visitors and tourists. It is well-equipped to cater to the needs of visitors with special needs, whether they are young children, elderly or visually-impaired.
Items.descriptionContentTc: 此區內大型商場由行人天橋連接兩個主要部分，即黃大仙中心北館(前稱龍翔廣場)及黃大仙中心南館(前稱黃大仙中心)。商場透過優化購物環境及商戶組合，為區內居民、到訪黃大仙的其他市民和遊客帶來更全面的購物體驗。商場設施齊全，不論是兒童、老人或是視障和傷殘人士，領展都會致力為顧客服務，滿足您的需要。
Items.descriptionContentSc: 此区内大型商场由行人天桥连接两个主要部分，即黄大仙中心北馆(前称龙翔广场)及黄大仙中心南馆(前称黄大仙中心)。商场透过优化购物环境及商户组合，为区内居民、到访黄大仙的其他市民和游客带来更全面的购物体验。商场设施齐全，不论是儿童、老人或是视障和伤残人士，领展都会致力为顾客服务，满足您的需要。

parkingInfoList.promotionPrivilegeDescriptionEn:
"From Monday to Sunday, from 10:00 am to 9:30 pm (according to vehicle entry time), "Link Up" members can enjoy 2 hour free parking by using at most 3 machine printed receipt from shopping centre and or wet market (if applicable) with total spending of $300 or more at the related Car Parks. (*Shopper must present member ID in "Link UP" Apps to enjoy the above offer)

*Customer is required to present the original cardholder copy of electronic payment (including EPS, credit card, Octopus & etc) receipts
*Free parking is extended for 2 extra hour for hourly patrons who are eligible for our free parking program by spending up to a designated amount provided that one of the receipts presented is issued by any food and beverage tenants of the Shopping Mall

MTR Park & Ride Scheme
From Monday to Friday (excluding public holidays), park your car from 6am to 7:29pm (based on entry time) at one of Link’s shopping centre* car parks and then ride the MTR, you can enjoy the Park & Ride offer by getting 1 hour free parking for 3 hours of parking, or 3 hours free parking for 6 hours of parking, or even 7 hours free parking for 10 hours of parking!

How to Redeem: Link’s "Link UP" app user must use the same Octopus card to park your car at a designated Link car park and ride on the MTR, show the proof of any spending in the designated shopping centre, and redeem one of the above free parking offers at customer service desk between 10am and 9:30pm.

"EV Park" Electric Vehicle Free Parking Privilege

 

Registered EV shall enjoy free parking privilege for the particular EV at certain participating car parks upon any amount of spending with machine-printed receipt under the portfolio of Link, from 10am to 10pm daily.


*The offer is eligible for private cars only, cannot be used together with other privilege  

*Subject to the terms and conditions


The car parks are subject to user restrictions under the relevant government lease and / or deed of mutual covenants, for details, please observe the conditions of parking and any changes or additions thereto imposed from time to time displayed at the entrance of the relevant car park."
parkingInfoList.promotionPrivilegeDescriptionTc:
"逢星期一至日，早上10時至晚上9時半（以入車時間計算），「Link Up」會員憑商場或街市(如適用)發出之即日機印發票最多3張並購物消費滿$300或以上，即可享有2小時免費泊車優惠。(*必須出示『Link UP』應用程式中的會員編號，方可享以上優惠)

*顧客必須出示相關之電子貨幣〈包括易辦事、信用卡、八達通等〉付款存根正本〈持卡人存根〉
*顧客參加本商場消費泊車優惠滿指定金額，其中一張消費單據由商場內任何一所食肆簽發，即可享額外2小時免費泊車優惠

「泊車轉乘港鐵優惠」

逢星期一至五（公眾假期除外）早上6時至晚上7時29分（以入車時間計算），顧客於領展商場*停車場泊車後轉乘港鐵，泊車3小時即可享有1小時免費泊車優惠，泊車6小時即可享有3小時免費泊車優惠，泊車10小時更享高達7小時免費泊車優惠。

換領方法：「Link UP」手機程式用戶須使用同一張八達通卡於指定領展停車場泊車後轉乘港鐵，提供指定商場的任何消費證明，便可於當日早上10時至晚上9時30分期間，前往客戶服務台換領免費泊車優惠。

「EV泊」電動車免費泊車優惠

 

成功申請者駕駛已登記本優惠之電動車進入領展旗下參與停車場，並出示任何消費金額之機印發票，可享一小時免費泊車優惠 (由每天早上10時至晚上10時)

 

*優惠祇適用於私家車，不可以與其他形式的泊車優惠同時使用

*受條款及細則限制



停車場使用者受地契及／或大厦公契條款約束, 詳情請參閱個別停車場入口所展示的各項泊車條款及其後之變更。"
parkingInfoList.promotionPrivilegeDescriptionSc:
"逢星期一至日，早上10时至晚上9时半（以入车时间计算），「Link Up」会员凭商场或街市(如适用)发出之即日机印发票最多3张并购物消费满$300或以上，即可享有2小时免费泊车优惠。(*必须出示『Link UP』应用程式中的会员编号，方可享以上优惠)

*顾客必须出示相关之电子货币〈包括易办事、信用卡、八达通等〉付款存根正本〈持卡人存根〉
*顾客参加本商场消费泊车优惠满指定金额，其中一张消费单据由商场内任何一所食肆签发，即可享额外2小时免费泊车优惠

「泊车转乘港铁优惠」

逢星期一至五（公众假期除外）早上6时至晚上7时29分（以入车时间计算），顾客於领展商场*停车场泊车後转乘港铁，泊车3小时即可享有1小时免费泊车优惠，泊车6小时即可享有3小时免费泊车优惠，泊车10小时更享高达7小时免费泊车优惠。

换领方法：「Link UP」手机程式用户须使用同一张八达通卡於指定领展停车场泊车後转乘港铁，提供指定商场的任何消费证明，便可於当日早上10时至晚上9时30分期间，前往客户服务台换领免费泊车优惠。

 

「EV泊」电动车免费泊车优惠

 

成功申请者驾驶已登记本优惠之电动车进入领展旗下参与停车场，并出示任何消费金额之机印发票，可享一小时免费泊车优惠 (由每天早上10时至晚上10时)

 

*优惠只适用於私家车，不可以与其他形式的泊车优惠同时使用

*受条款及细则限制



停车场使用者受地契及／或大厦公契条款约束, 详情请参阅个别停车场入口所展示的各项泊车条款及其後之变更。"

parkingInfoList.promotionPrivilegeDescriptionEn:
"From Monday to Sunday, from 10:00 am to 9:30 pm (according to vehicle entry time), "Link Up" members can enjoy 2 hour free parking by using at most 3 machine printed receipt from shopping centre and or wet market (if applicable) with total spending of $300 or more at the related Car Parks. (*Shopper must present member ID in "Link UP" Apps to enjoy the above offer)

*Customer is required to present the original cardholder copy of electronic payment (including EPS, credit card, Octopus & etc) receipts
*Free parking is extended for 2 extra hour for hourly patrons who are eligible for our free parking program by spending up to a designated amount provided that one of the receipts presented is issued by any food and beverage tenants of the Shopping Mall

MTR Park & Ride Scheme
From Monday to Friday (excluding public holidays), park your car from 6am to 7:29pm (based on entry time) at one of Link’s shopping centre* car parks and then ride the MTR, you can enjoy the Park & Ride offer by getting 1 hour free parking for 3 hours of parking, or 3 hours free parking for 6 hours of parking, or even 7 hours free parking for 10 hours of parking!

How to Redeem: Link’s "Link UP" app user must use the same Octopus card to park your car at a designated Link car park and ride on the MTR, show the proof of any spending in the designated shopping centre, and redeem one of the above free parking offers at customer service desk between 10am and 9:30pm.

*Subject to the terms and conditions

 

"EV Park" Electric Vehicle Free Parking Privilege

Registered EV shall enjoy free parking privilege for the particular EV at certain participating car parks upon any amount of spending with machine-printed receipt under the portfolio of Link, from 10am to 10pm daily.



*The offer is eligible for private cars only, cannot be used together with other privilege
*Subject to the terms and conditions



The car parks are subject to user restrictions under the relevant government lease and / or deed of mutual covenants, for details, please observe the conditions of parking and any changes or additions thereto imposed from time to time displayed at the entrance of the relevant car park."
parkingInfoList.promotionPrivilegeDescriptionTc:
"逢星期一至日，早上10時至晚上9時半（以入車時間計算），「Link Up」會員憑商場或街市(如適用)發出之即日機印發票最多3張並購物消費滿$300或以上，即可享有2小時免費泊車優惠。(*必須出示『Link UP』應用程式中的會員編號，方可享以上優惠)

*顧客必須出示相關之電子貨幣〈包括易辦事、信用卡、八達通等〉付款存根正本〈持卡人存根〉
*顧客參加本商場消費泊車優惠滿指定金額，其中一張消費單據由商場內任何一所食肆簽發，即可享額外2小時免費泊車優惠

「泊車轉乘港鐵優惠」

逢星期一至五（公眾假期除外）早上6時至晚上7時29分（以入車時間計算），顧客於領展商場*停車場泊車後轉乘港鐵，泊車3小時即可享有1小時免費泊車優惠，泊車6小時即可享有3小時免費泊車優惠，泊車10小時更享高達7小時免費泊車優惠。

換領方法：「Link UP」手機程式用戶須使用同一張八達通卡於指定領展停車場泊車後轉乘港鐵，提供指定商場的任何消費證明，便可於當日早上10時至晚上9時30分期間，前往客戶服務台換領免費泊車優惠。

*受條款及細則限制

 

「EV泊」電動車免費泊車優惠

 

成功申請者駕駛已登記本優惠之電動車進入領展旗下參與停車場，並出示任何消費金額之機印發票，可享一小時免費泊車優惠 (由每天早上10時至晚上10時)

 

*優惠祇適用於私家車，不可以與其他形式的泊車優惠同時使用

*優惠受條款及細則約束 




停車場使用者受地契及／或大厦公契條款約束, 詳情請參閱個別停車場入口所展示的各項泊車條款及其後之變更。"
parkingInfoList.promotionPrivilegeDescriptionSc:
"逢星期一至日，早上10时至晚上9时半（以入车时间计算），「Link Up」会员凭商场或街市(如适用)发出之即日机印发票最多3张并购物消费满$300或以上，即可享有2小时免费泊车优惠。(*必须出示『Link UP』应用程式中的会员编号，方可享以上优惠)

*顾客必须出示相关之电子货币〈包括易办事、信用卡、八达通等〉付款存根正本〈持卡人存根〉
*顾客参加本商场消费泊车优惠满指定金额，其中一张消费单据由商场内任何一所食肆签发，即可享额外2小时免费泊车优惠

「泊车转乘港铁优惠」

逢星期一至五（公众假期除外）早上6时至晚上7时29分（以入车时间计算），顾客於领展商场*停车场泊车後转乘港铁，泊车3小时即可享有1小时免费泊车优惠，泊车6小时即可享有3小时免费泊车优惠，泊车10小时更享高达7小时免费泊车优惠。

换领方法：「Link UP」手机程式用户须使用同一张八达通卡於指定领展停车场泊车後转乘港铁，提供指定商场的任何消费证明，便可於当日早上10时至晚上9时30分期间，前往客户服务台换领免费泊车优惠。

*受条款及细则限制

「EV泊」电动车免费泊车优惠

成功申请者驾驶已登记本优惠之电动车进入领展旗下参与停车场，并出示任何消费金额之机印发票，可享一小时免费泊车优惠 (由每天早上10时至晚上10时)

 

*优惠只适用於私家车，不可以与其他形式的泊车优惠同时使用
*受条款及细则限制



停车场使用者受地契及／或大厦公契条款约束, 详情请参阅个别停车场入口所展示的各项泊车条款及其後之变更。"

parkingInfoList.promotionPrivilegeDescriptionEn:
From Monday to Sunday, from 10:00 am to 9:30 pm (according to vehicle entry time), "Link Up" members can enjoy 1 hour free parking by using 2 machine printed receipt from shopping centre or not more than machine printed receipts from wet market with total spending of $200 or more at the related Car Parks. If it is spent by using Dah Sing HAPPY visa card, 1 hour extra free parking will be given. (*Shopper must present member ID in "Link UP" Apps to enjoy the above offer)

MTR Park & Ride Scheme

From Monday to Friday (excluding public holidays), park your car from 6am to 7:29pm (based on entry time) at one of Link’s shopping centre* car parks and then ride the MTR, you can enjoy the Park & Ride offer by getting 1 hour free parking for 3 hours of parking, or 3 hours free parking for 6 hours of parking, or even 7 hours free parking for 10 hours of parking!

How to Redeem: Link’s Park & Dine app user must use the same Octopus card to park your car at a designated Link car park and ride on the MTR, show the proof of any spending in the designated shopping centre, and redeem one of the above free parking offers at customer service desk between 10am and 9:30pm.

EV Free Parking Privilege

Successful registrants of the privilege must enter the designated car parks by using the pre-registered Octopus Card and redeem 1 hour free parking from 10:00 to 21:30 at the customer service counter by presenting a machine-printed receipt made at the corresponding shopping centre or fresh market of the designated car parks.

*Subject to the terms and conditions


The car parks are subject to user restrictions under the relevant government lease and / or deed of mutual covenants, for details, please observe the conditions of parking and any changes or additions thereto imposed from time to time displayed at the entrance of the relevant car park.
parkingInfoList.promotionPrivilegeDescriptionTc:
逢星期一至日，早上10時至晚上9時半（以入車時間計算），「Link Up」會員憑商場即日機印發票2張或不多於街市即日機印發票張並購物消費滿$200或以上，即可享有1小時免費泊車優惠。如該發票是以大新銀行HAPPY VISA CARD簽賬，則額外享有多1小時免費泊車。(*必須出示『Link UP』應用程式中的會員編號，方可享以上優惠)


「泊車轉乘港鐵優惠」

逢星期一至五（公眾假期除外）早上6時至晚上7時29分（以入車時間計算），顧客於領展商場*停車場泊車後轉乘港鐵，泊車3小時即可享有1小時免費泊車優惠，泊車6小時即可享有3小時免費泊車優惠，泊車10小時更享高達7小時免費泊車優惠。

換領方法：「泊食易」手機程式用戶須使用同一張八達通卡於指定領展停車場泊車後轉乘港鐵，提供指定商場的任何消費證明，便可於當日早上10時至晚上9時30分期間，前往客戶服務台換領免費泊車優惠。

「電動車免費泊車優惠」

本優惠之成功登記者須使用已登記八達通進入指定停車場，並於早上10時至晚上9時30分於客戶服務台出示領展旗下參與電動車泊車優惠之商場／街市任何消費金額之即日機印發票以辦理1小時免費泊車優惠。

*受條款及細則限制


停車場使用者受地契及／或大厦公契條款約束, 詳情請參閱個別停車場入口所展示的各項泊車條款及其後之變更。
parkingInfoList.promotionPrivilegeDescriptionSc:
逢星期一至日，早上10时至晚上9时半（以入车时间计算），「Link Up」会员凭商场即日机印发票2张或不多於街市即日机印发票张并购物消费满$200或以上，即可享有1小时免费泊车优惠。如该发票是以大新银行HAPPY VISA CARD签账，则额外享有多1小时免费泊车。(*必须出示『Link UP』应用程式中的会员编号，方可享以上优惠)


「泊车转乘港铁优惠」

逢星期一至五（公众假期除外）早上6时至晚上7时29分（以入车时间计算），顾客於领展商场*停车场泊车後转乘港铁，泊车3小时即可享有1小时免费泊车优惠，泊车6小时即可享有3小时免费泊车优惠，泊车10小时更享高达7小时免费泊车优惠。

换领方法：「泊食易」手机程式用户须使用同一张八达通卡於指定领展停车场泊车後转乘港铁，提供指定商场的任何消费证明，便可於当日早上10时至晚上9时30分期间，前往客户服务台换领免费泊车优惠。

「电动车免费泊车优惠」

本优惠之成功登记者须使用已登记八达通进入指定停车场，并於早上10时至晚上9时30分於客户服务台出示领展旗下参与电动车泊车优惠之商场／街市任何消费金额之即日机印发票以办理1小时免费泊车优惠。

*受条款及细则限制


停车场使用者受地契及／或大厦公契条款约束, 详情请参阅个别停车场入口所展示的各项泊车条款及其後之变更。

Items.descriptionContentEn: Siu Sai Wan Plaza‘s attractive and vibrant LED-lit façade has been a landmark in the local neighborhood since its renovation was completed in 2009. The revamped entrance draws residents in to enjoy the many shops, restaurants, and service providers that fill this spacious and bright shopping centre. For shoppers’ convenience, there are 558 parking spaces and a fresh market.
Items.descriptionContentTc: 小西灣廣場自2009年完成優化工程後，其色彩奪目的LED燈外牆令廣場成為鄰近地區的地標。引人注目的新入口吸引居民到廣場消閒購物。偌大光亮的商場涵蓋了多間特色商舖、食肆及其他服務，並設有558個泊車位和一個鮮活街市，方便顧客。
Items.descriptionContentSc: 小西湾广场自2009年完成优化工程後，其色彩夺目的LED灯外墙令广场成为邻近地区的地标。引人注目的新入口吸引居民到广场消闲购物。偌大光亮的商场涵盖了多间特色商舖、食肆及其他服务，并设有558个泊车位和一个鲜活街市，方便顾客。

parkingInfoList.promotionPrivilegeDescriptionEn:
From Monday to Sunday, from 10:00 am to 9:30 pm (according to vehicle entry time), "Link Up" members can enjoy 1 hour free parking by using at most 2 machine printed receipt from shopping centre and or wet market (if applicable) with total spending of $200 or more at the related Car Parks. (*Shopper must present member ID in "Link UP" Apps to enjoy the above offer)

*Customer is required to present the original cardholder copy of electronic payment (including EPS, credit card, Octopus & etc) receipts
*Free parking is extended for 2 extra hour for hourly patrons who are eligible for our free parking program by spending up to a designated amount provided that one of the receipts presented is issued by any food and beverage tenants of the Shopping Mall

"EV Park" Electric Vehicle Free Parking Privilege

 

Registered EV shall enjoy free parking privilege for the particular EV at certain participating car parks upon any amount of spending with machine-printed receipt under the portfolio of Link, from 10am to 10pm daily.



*The offer is eligible for private cars only, cannot be used together with other privilege
*Subject to the terms and conditions




The car parks are subject to user restrictions under the relevant government lease and / or deed of mutual covenants, for details, please observe the conditions of parking and any changes or additions thereto imposed from time to time displayed at the entrance of the relevant car park.
parkingInfoList.promotionPrivilegeDescriptionTc:
逢星期一至日，早上10時至晚上9時半（以入車時間計算），「Link Up」會員憑商場或街市(如適用)發出之即日機印發票最多2張並購物消費滿$200或以上，即可享有1小時免費泊車優惠。(*必須出示『Link UP』應用程式中的會員編號，方可享以上優惠)

*顧客必須出示相關之電子貨幣〈包括易辦事、信用卡、八達通等〉付款存根正本〈持卡人存根〉
*顧客參加本商場消費泊車優惠滿指定金額，其中一張消費單據由商場內任何一所食肆簽發，即可享額外2小時免費泊車優惠

「EV泊」電動車免費泊車優惠

 

成功申請者駕駛已登記本優惠之電動車進入領展旗下參與停車場，並出示任何消費金額之機印發票，可享一小時免費泊車優惠 (由每天早上10時至晚上10時)

 

*優惠祇適用於私家車，不可以與其他形式的泊車優惠同時使用

*優惠受條款及細則約束 




停車場使用者受地契及／或大厦公契條款約束, 詳情請參閱個別停車場入口所展示的各項泊車條款及其後之變更。
parkingInfoList.promotionPrivilegeDescriptionSc:
逢星期一至日，早上10时至晚上9时半（以入车时间计算），「Link Up」会员凭商场或街市(如适用)发出之即日机印发票最多2张并购物消费满$200或以上，即可享有1小时免费泊车优惠。(*必须出示『Link UP』应用程式中的会员编号，方可享以上优惠)

*顾客必须出示相关之电子货币〈包括易办事、信用卡、八达通等〉付款存根正本〈持卡人存根〉
*顾客参加本商场消费泊车优惠满指定金额，其中一张消费单据由商场内任何一所食肆签发，即可享额外2小时免费泊车优惠

「EV泊」电动车免费泊车优惠

成功申请者驾驶已登记本优惠之电动车进入领展旗下参与停车场，并出示任何消费金额之机印发票，可享一小时免费泊车优惠 (由每天早上10时至晚上10时)

*优惠只适用於私家车，不可以与其他形式的泊车优惠同时使用
*受条款及细则限制



停车场使用者受地契及／或大厦公契条款约束, 详情请参阅个别停车场入口所展示的各项泊车条款及其後之变更。

parkingInfoList.promotionPrivilegeDescriptionEn:
From Monday to Sunday, from 10:00 am to 9:30 pm (according to vehicle entry time), "Link Up" members can enjoy 1 hour free parking by using at most 2 machine printed receipt from shopping centre and or wet market (if applicable) with total spending of $200 or more at the related Car Parks. (*Shopper must present member ID in "Link UP" Apps to enjoy the above offer)

*The offer is eligible for private cars only, cannot be used together with other privilege
*Customer is required to present the original cardholder copy of electronic payment (including EPS, credit card, Octopus & etc) receipts
*Free parking is extended for 2 extra hour for hourly patrons who are eligible for our free parking program by spending up to a designated amount provided that one of the receipts presented is issued by any food and beverage tenants of the Shopping Mall
*Subject to the terms and conditions


The car parks are subject to user restrictions under the relevant government lease and / or deed of mutual covenants, for details, please observe the conditions of parking and any changes or additions thereto imposed from time to time displayed at the entrance of the relevant car park.
parkingInfoList.promotionPrivilegeDescriptionTc:
逢星期一至日，早上10時至晚上9時半（以入車時間計算），「Link Up」會員憑商場或街市(如適用)發出之即日機印發票最多2張並購物消費滿$200或以上，即可享有1小時免費泊車優惠。(*必須出示『Link UP』應用程式中的會員編號，方可享以上優惠)

*優惠祇適用於私家車，不可以與其他形式的泊車優惠同時使用
*顧客必須出示相關之電子貨幣〈包括易辦事、信用卡、八達通等〉付款存根正本〈持卡人存根〉
*顧客參加本商場消費泊車優惠滿指定金額，其中一張消費單據由商場內任何一所食肆簽發，即可享額外2小時免費泊車優惠
*受條款及細則限制


停車場使用者受地契及／或大厦公契條款約束, 詳情請參閱個別停車場入口所展示的各項泊車條款及其後之變更。
parkingInfoList.promotionPrivilegeDescriptionSc:
逢星期一至日，早上10时至晚上9时半（以入车时间计算），「Link Up」会员凭商场或街市(如适用)发出之即日机印发票最多2张并购物消费满$200或以上，即可享有1小时免费泊车优惠。(*必须出示『Link UP』应用程式中的会员编号，方可享以上优惠)

*优惠只适用於私家车，不可以与其他形式的泊车优惠同时使用
*顾客必须出示相关之电子货币〈包括易办事、信用卡、八达通等〉付款存根正本〈持卡人存根〉
*顾客参加本商场消费泊车优惠满指定金额，其中一张消费单据由商场内任何一所食肆签发，即可享额外2小时免费泊车优惠
*受条款及细则限制


停车场使用者受地契及／或大厦公契条款约束, 详情请参阅个别停车场入口所展示的各项泊车条款及其後之变更。

逢星期一至日，早上10时至晚上9时半（以入车时间计算），「Link Up」会员凭商场或街市(如适用)发出之即日机印发票最多2张并购物消费满$200或以上，即可享有1小时免费泊车优惠。(*必须出示『Link UP』应用程式中的会员编号，方可享以上优惠)

*优惠只适用於私家车，不可以与其他形式的泊车优惠同时使用
*顾客必须出示相关之电子货币〈包括易办事、信用卡、八达通等〉付款存根正本〈持卡人存根〉
*顾客参加本商场消费泊车优惠满指定金额，其中一张消费单据由商场内任何一所食肆签发，即可享额外2小时免费泊车优惠
*受条款及细则限制

parkingInfoList.promotionPrivilegeDescriptionEn:
EV Free Parking Privilege

Successful registrants of the privilege must enter the designated car parks by using the pre-registered Octopus Card and redeem 1 hour free parking from 10:00 to 21:30 at the customer service counter by presenting a machine-printed receipt made at the corresponding shopping centre or fresh market of the designated car parks.

* Offer subject to terms & conditions.


The car parks are subject to user restrictions under the relevant government lease and / or deed of mutual covenants, for details, please observe the conditions of parking and any changes or additions thereto imposed from time to time displayed at the entrance of the relevant car park.
parkingInfoList.promotionPrivilegeDescriptionTc:
「電動車免費泊車優惠」

本優惠之成功登記者須使用已登記八達通進入指定停車場，並於早上10時至晚上9時30分於客戶服務台出示領展旗下參與電動車泊車優惠之商場／街市任何消費金額之即日機印發票以辦理1小時免費泊車優惠。

*優惠須受條款與細則約束

Items.descriptionContentEn: Choi Yuen Plaza offers easy access to the nearby MTR and offers over 530 parking spaces with Electric Vehicle Charging System. Comprehensive offering, including diversified F&B, Personal Care, Fashions & Sports Equipment, etc., and the spacious retail zone allows visitors an enjoyable shopping experience in the Plaza. In the asset enhancement work completed in 2020, the leisure facilities and children playground was renovated, which enable Choi Yuen Plaza as an all-encompassing shopping destination for families.
Items.descriptionContentTc: 彩園廣場鄰近港鐵上水站，交通便利，並提供超過530個車位，並設有電動車充電站。廣場空間感十足，設有多元化商舖包括不同類型食肆、個人護理、時尚服飾、運動服裝等。於2020年的優化工程中更已翻新戶外的遊樂設施，讓精力充沛的小朋友們盡情玩樂，是一家大小購物的好去處。
Items.descriptionContentSc: 彩园广场邻近港铁上水站，交通便利，并提供超过530个车位，并设有电动车充电站。广场空间感十足，设有多元化商舖包括不同类型食肆、个人护理、时尚服饰、运动服装等。於2020年的优化工程中更已翻新户外的游乐设施，让精力充沛的小朋友们尽情玩乐，是一家大小购物的好去处。

parkingInfoList.promotionPrivilegeDescriptionEn:
"From Monday to Sunday, from 10:00 am to 9:30 pm (according to vehicle entry time), "Link Up" members can enjoy 2 hour free parking by using at most 3 machine printed receipt from shopping centre and or wet market (if applicable) with total spending of $300 or more at the related Car Parks. (*Shopper must present member ID in "Link UP" Apps to enjoy the above offer)

*The offer is eligible for private cars only, cannot be used together with other privilege
*Customer is required to present the original cardholder copy of electronic payment (including EPS, credit card, Octopus & etc) receipts
*Free parking is extended for 2 extra hour for hourly patrons who are eligible for our free parking program by spending up to a designated amount provided that one of the receipts presented is issued by any food and beverage tenants of the Shopping Mall
*Subject to the terms and conditions

"EV Park" Electric Vehicle Free Parking Privilege

 

Registered EV shall enjoy free parking privilege for the particular EV at certain participating car parks upon any amount of spending with machine-printed receipt under the portfolio of Link, from 10am to 10pm daily.



*The offer is eligible for private cars only, cannot be used together with other privilege
*Subject to the terms and conditions


The car parks are subject to user restrictions under the relevant government lease and / or deed of mutual covenants, for details, please observe the conditions of parking and any changes or additions thereto imposed from time to time displayed at the entrance of the relevant car park."
parkingInfoList.promotionPrivilegeDescriptionTc:
"逢星期一至日，早上10時至晚上9時半（以入車時間計算），「Link Up」會員憑商場或街市(如適用)發出之即日機印發票最多3張並購物消費滿$300或以上，即可享有2小時免費泊車優惠。(*必須出示『Link UP』應用程式中的會員編號，方可享以上優惠)

*優惠祇適用於私家車，不可以與其他形式的泊車優惠同時使用
*顧客必須出示相關之電子貨幣〈包括易辦事、信用卡、八達通等〉付款存根正本〈持卡人存根〉
*顧客參加本商場消費泊車優惠滿指定金額，其中一張消費單據由商場內任何一所食肆簽發，即可享額外2小時免費泊車優惠
*受條款及細則限制

 

「EV泊」電動車免費泊車優惠

 

成功申請者駕駛已登記本優惠之電動車進入領展旗下參與停車場，並出示任何消費金額之機印發票，可享一小時免費泊車優惠 (由每天早上10時至晚上10時)

 

*優惠祇適用於私家車，不可以與其他形式的泊車優惠同時使用

*優惠受條款及細則約束 



停車場使用者受地契及／或大厦公契條款約束, 詳情請參閱個別停車場入口所展示的各項泊車條款及其後之變更。"
parkingInfoList.promotionPrivilegeDescriptionSc:
"逢星期一至日，早上10时至晚上9时半（以入车时间计算），「Link Up」会员凭商场或街市(如适用)发出之即日机印发票最多3张并购物消费满$300或以上，即可享有2小时免费泊车优惠。(*必须出示『Link UP』应用程式中的会员编号，方可享以上优惠)

*优惠只适用於私家车，不可以与其他形式的泊车优惠同时使用
*顾客必须出示相关之电子货币〈包括易办事、信用卡、八达通等〉付款存根正本〈持卡人存根〉
*顾客参加本商场消费泊车优惠满指定金额，其中一张消费单据由商场内任何一所食肆签发，即可享额外2小时免费泊车优惠
*受条款及细则限制

「EV泊」电动车免费泊车优惠

成功申请者驾驶已登记本优惠之电动车进入领展旗下参与停车场，并出示任何消费金额之机印发票，可享一小时免费泊车优惠 (由每天早上10时至晚上10时)

 

*优惠只适用於私家车，不可以与其他形式的泊车优惠同时使用
*受条款及细则限制


停车场使用者受地契及／或大厦公契条款约束, 详情请参阅个别停车场入口所展示的各项泊车条款及其後之变更。"

Items.descriptionTitleEn: "Stanley Plaza is a unique lifestyle destination situated on the picturesque waterfront of Stanley on Hong Kong Island's south side, adding to Stanley's well-known main street and heritage landmark Murray House."
Items.descriptionTitleTc: "赤柱廣場位處香港島南面的赤柱，背靠翠山，面朝碧海，風景如畫。"
Items.descriptionTitleSc: "赤柱广场位处香港岛南面的赤柱，背靠翠山，面朝碧海，风景如画。"
Items.descriptionContentEn: Stanley Plaza has become a magnet for many residents and tourists looking for a leisurely, al fresco dining and shopping experience with beautiful Stanley Bay views. Highlights include a specialty coffee, food and wine shops and many gourmet restaurants. The gem in Stanley Plaza’s crown is the lively piazza, which caters to families and their pets alike with a 300-seat, glass canopied open-air amphitheater and playground featuring a pirate ship.
Items.descriptionContentTc: 區內著名的赤柱大街和歷史遺跡美利樓一直是旅遊熱點，吸引不少市民和遊客到訪，享受赤柱海邊怡人的景色、戶外用餐的悠閒和購物的樂趣。精選店鋪包括咖啡、食品和洋酒專賣店，還有數之不盡的頂級餐廳。赤柱廣場的最大特色在於翻新完畢的露天廣場。廣場設有300個座位，玻璃天幕半露天劇場和以海盜船為主題的遊樂場。
Items.descriptionContentSc: 区内着名的赤柱大街和历史遗迹美利楼一直是旅游热点，吸引不少市民和游客到访，享受赤柱海边怡人的景色、户外用餐的悠闲和购物的乐趣。精选店铺包括咖啡、食品和洋酒专卖店，还有数之不尽的顶级餐厅。赤柱广场的最大特色在於翻新完毕的露天广场。广场设有300个座位，玻璃天幕半露天剧场和以海盗船为主题的游乐场。

parkingInfoList.promotionPrivilegeDescriptionEn:
From Monday to Friday, from 10:00am to 11:00pm (Vehicle Entry Time: 10:00 am to 9:30 pm), "Link Up" members can enjoy a maximum of 2 hours free parking with spending of $200 or above, or "Link Up" members can enjoy a maximum of 4 hours' free parking with spending of $400 or above by presenting a maximum of 2 machine printed receipts of same-day spending. (*Shopper must present member ID in "Link Up" Apps to enjoy the above offer) ;

On Saturdays, Sundays or public holidays, from 10:00am to 11:00pm (Vehicle Entry Time: 10:00 am to 9:30 pm), "Link Up" members can enjoy a maximum of 2 hours free parking with spending of $400 or above, or "Link Up" members can enjoy a maximum of 4 hours' free parking with spending of $800 or above by presenting a maximum of 2 machine printed receipts of same-day spending. (*Shopper must present member ID in "Link Up" Apps to enjoy the above offer) ;

*Customer is required to present the original cardholder copy of electronic payment (including EPS, credit card, Octopus & etc) receipts
*Free parking is extended for 2 extra hours for hourly patrons who are eligible for our free parking program by spending up to a designated amount provided that one of the receipts presented is issued by any food and beverage tenants of the shopping mall

"EV Park" Electric Vehicle Free Parking Privilege

 

Registered EV shall enjoy free parking privilege for the particular EV at certain participating car parks upon any amount of spending with machine-printed receipt under the portfolio of Link, from 10am to 10pm daily.


*The offer is eligible for private cars only, cannot be used together with other privilege
*Subject to the terms and conditions

 

The car parks are subject to user restrictions under the relevant government lease and / or deed of mutual covenants. For details, please refer to the conditions of parking and any changes or additions thereto imposed from time to time displayed at the entrance of the relevant car park.
parkingInfoList.promotionPrivilegeDescriptionTc:
逢星期一至五，上午10時至晚上11時（入車時間﹕上午10時至晚上9時30分），「Link Up」會員消費滿$200或以上，並出示商場內商戶發出之即日機印發票（最多2張），即可享有2小時免費泊車優惠；「Link Up」會員消費滿$400或以上，並出示商場內商戶發出之即日機印發票（最多2張），即可享有4小時免費泊車優惠。（*必須出示『Link Up』應用程式中的會員編號，方可享以上優惠。）

逢星期六、日及公眾假期，上午10時至晚上11時（入車時間﹕上午10時至晚上9時30分），「Link Up」會員消費滿$400或以上，並出示商場內商戶發出之即日機印發票（最多2張），即可享有2小時免費泊車優惠；「Link Up」會員消費滿$800或以上，並出示商場內商戶發出之即日機印發票（最多2張），即可享有4小時免費泊車優惠。（*必須出示『Link Up』應用程式中的會員編號，方可享以上優惠。）

 

*顧客必須出示相關之電子貨幣（包括易辦事、信用卡、八達通等）付款存根正本（持卡人存根）
*顧客參加本商場消費泊車優惠滿指定金額，其中一張消費單據由商場內任何一所食肆簽發，即可享額外2小時免費泊車優惠

「EV泊」電動車免費泊車優惠

 

成功申請者駕駛已登記本優惠之電動車進入領展旗下參與停車場，並出示任何消費金額之機印發票，可享一小時免費泊車優惠 (由每天早上10時至晚上10時)

 

*優惠祇適用於私家車，不可以與其他形式的泊車優惠同時使用

*優惠受條款及細則約束 




停車場使用者受地契及／或大廈公契條款約束，詳情請參閱個別停車場入口所展示的各項泊車條款及其後之變更。
parkingInfoList.promotionPrivilegeDescriptionSc:
逢星期一至五，上午10时至晚上11时（入车时间﹕上午10时至晚上9时30分），「Link Up」会员消费满$200或以上，并出示商场内商户发出之即日机印发票（最多2张），即可享有2小时免费泊车优惠；「Link Up」会员消费满$400或以上，并出示商场内商户发出之即日机印发票（最多2张），即可享有4小时免费泊车优惠。 （*必须出示『Link Up』应用程式中的会员编号，方可享以上优惠。）

逢星期六、日及公众假期，上午10时至晚上11时（入车时间﹕上午10时至晚上9时30分），「Link Up」会员消费满$400或以上，并出示商场内商户发出之即日机印发票（最多2张），即可享有2小时免费泊车优惠；「Link Up」会员消费满$800或以上，并出示商场内商户发出之即日机印发票（最多2张），即可享有4小时免费泊车优惠。 （*必须出示『Link Up』应用程式中的会员编号，方可享以上优惠。）

*顾客必须出示相关之电子货币（包括易办事、信用卡、八达通等）付款存根正本（持卡人存根）
*顾客参加本商场消费泊车优惠满指定金额，其中一张消费单据由商场内任何一所食肆签发，即可享额外2小时免费泊车优惠

 

「EV泊」电动车免费泊车优惠

 

成功申请者驾驶已登记本优惠之电动车进入领展旗下参与停车场，并出示任何消费金额之机印发票，可享一小时免费泊车优惠 (由每天早上10时至晚上10时)

 

*优惠只适用於私家车，不可以与其他形式的泊车优惠同时使用
*受条款及细则限制


停车场使用者受地契及／或大厦公契条款约束，详情请参阅个别停车场入口所展示的各项泊车条款及其後之变更。

parkingInfoList.promotionPrivilegeDescriptionEn:
From Monday to Sunday, from 10:00 am to 9:30 pm (according to vehicle entry time), "Link Up" members can enjoy 2 hour free parking by using at most 3 machine printed receipt from shopping centre and or wet market (if applicable) with total spending of $300 or more at the related Car Parks. (*Shopper must present member ID in "Link UP" Apps to enjoy the above offer)

*The offer is eligible for private cars only, cannot be used together with other privilege
*Customer is required to present the original cardholder copy of electronic payment (including EPS, credit card, Octopus & etc) receipts
*Free parking is extended for 2 extra hour for hourly patrons who are eligible for our free parking program by spending up to a designated amount provided that one of the receipts presented is issued by any food and beverage tenants of the Shopping Mall
*Subject to the terms and conditions

 

The car parks are subject to user restrictions under the relevant government lease and / or deed of mutual covenants, for details, please observe the conditions of parking and any changes or additions thereto imposed from time to time displayed at the entrance of the relevant car park.
parkingInfoList.promotionPrivilegeDescriptionTc:
逢星期一至日，早上10時至晚上9時半（以入車時間計算），「Link Up」會員憑商場或街市(如適用)發出之即日機印發票最多3張並購物消費滿$300或以上，即可享有2小時免費泊車優惠。(*必須出示『Link UP』應用程式中的會員編號，方可享以上優惠)

*優惠祇適用於私家車，不可以與其他形式的泊車優惠同時使用
*顧客必須出示相關之電子貨幣〈包括易辦事、信用卡、八達通等〉付款存根正本〈持卡人存根〉
*顧客參加本商場消費泊車優惠滿指定金額，其中一張消費單據由商場內任何一所食肆簽發，即可享額外2小時免費泊車優惠
*受條款及細則限制

 

 

停車場使用者受地契及／或大厦公契條款約束, 詳情請參閱個別停車場入口所展示的各項泊車條款及其後之變更。
parkingInfoList.promotionPrivilegeDescriptionSc:
逢星期一至日，早上10时至晚上9时半（以入车时间计算），「Link Up」会员凭商场或街市(如适用)发出之即日机印发票最多3张并购物消费满$300或以上，即可享有2小时免费泊车优惠。(*必须出示『Link UP』应用程式中的会员编号，方可享以上优惠)

*优惠只适用於私家车，不可以与其他形式的泊车优惠同时使用
*顾客必须出示相关之电子货币〈包括易办事、信用卡、八达通等〉付款存根正本〈持卡人存根〉
*顾客参加本商场消费泊车优惠满指定金额，其中一张消费单据由商场内任何一所食肆签发，即可享额外2小时免费泊车优惠
*受条款及细则限制

 

 

停车场使用者受地契及／或大厦公契条款约束, 详情请参阅个别停车场入口所展示的各项泊车条款及其後之变更。

parkingInfoList.promotionPrivilegeDescriptionEn:
From Monday to Sunday, from 10:00 am to 9:30 pm (according to vehicle entry time), shoppers can enjoy 1 hour free parking by using at most 2 machine printed receipt from shopping centre and or wet market (if applicable) with total spending of $150 or more at the related Car Parks.

*The offer is eligible for private cars only, cannot be used together with other privilege
*Customer is required to present the original cardholder copy of electronic payment (including EPS, credit card, Octopus & etc) receipts
*Free parking is extended for 2 extra hour for hourly patrons who are eligible for our free parking program by spending up to a designated amount provided that one of the receipts presented is issued by any food and beverage tenants of the Shopping Mall
*Subject to the terms and conditions


The car parks are subject to user restrictions under the relevant government lease and / or deed of mutual covenants, for details, please observe the conditions of parking and any changes or additions thereto imposed from time to time displayed at the entrance of the relevant car park.

parkingInfoList.promotionPrivilegeDescriptionEn:
From Monday to Sunday, from 10:00 am to 9:30 pm (according to vehicle entry time), shoppers can enjoy 1 hour free parking by using 2 machine printed receipt from shopping centre or not more than machine printed receipts from wet market with total spending of $200 or more at the related Car Parks. If it is spent by using Dah Sing HAPPY visa card, 1 hour extra free parking will be given.

*The offer is eligible for private cars only, cannot be used together with other privilege
*Free parking is extended for 1 extra hour for hourly patrons who enter the car park after 5pm every day and are eligible for our free parking program by spending up to a designated amount provided that one of the receipts presented is issued by any food and beverage tenants of the Shopping Mall
*Subject to the terms and conditions


The car parks are subject to user restrictions under the relevant government lease and / or deed of mutual covenants, for details, please observe the conditions of parking and any changes or additions thereto imposed from time to time displayed at the entrance of the relevant car park.

*優惠祇適用於私家車，不可以與其他形式的泊車優惠同時使用
*每日下午5時後入車之時租泊車顧客，參加本商場消費泊車優惠滿指定金額，其中一張消費單據由商場內任何一所食肆簽發，即可享額外1小時免費泊車優惠

parkingInfoList.promotionPrivilegeDescriptionEn:
From Monday to Sunday, from 10:00 am to 9:30 pm (according to vehicle entry time), "Link Up" members can enjoy 1 hour free parking by using at most 2 machine printed receipt from shopping centre and or wet market (if applicable) with total spending of $200 or more at the related Car Parks. (*Shopper must present member ID in "Link UP" Apps to enjoy the above offer)

*The offer is eligible for private cars only, cannot be used together with other privilege
*Customer is required to present the original cardholder copy of electronic payment (including EPS, credit card, Octopus & etc) receipts
*Free parking is extended for 2 extra hour for hourly patrons who are eligible for our free parking program by spending up to a designated amount provided that one of the receipts presented is issued by any food and beverage tenants of the Shopping Mall
*Subject to the terms and conditions

 

"EV Park" Electric Vehicle Free Parking Privilege

 

Registered EV shall enjoy free parking privilege for the particular EV at certain participating car parks upon any amount of spending with machine-printed receipt under the portfolio of Link, from 10am to 10pm daily.



*The offer is eligible for private cars only, cannot be used together with other privilege
*Subject to the terms and conditions



The car parks are subject to user restrictions under the relevant government lease and / or deed of mutual covenants, for details, please observe the conditions of parking and any changes or additions thereto imposed from time to time displayed at the entrance of the relevant car park.
parkingInfoList.promotionPrivilegeDescriptionTc:
逢星期一至日，早上10時至晚上9時半（以入車時間計算），「Link Up」會員憑商場或街市(如適用)發出之即日機印發票最多2張並購物消費滿$200或以上，即可享有1小時免費泊車優惠。(*必須出示『Link UP』應用程式中的會員編號，方可享以上優惠)

*優惠祇適用於私家車，不可以與其他形式的泊車優惠同時使用
*顧客必須出示相關之電子貨幣〈包括易辦事、信用卡、八達通等〉付款存根正本〈持卡人存根〉
*顧客參加本商場消費泊車優惠滿指定金額，其中一張消費單據由商場內任何一所食肆簽發，即可享額外2小時免費泊車優惠

*受條款及細則限制

 

「EV泊」電動車免費泊車優惠

 

成功申請者駕駛已登記本優惠之電動車進入領展旗下參與停車場，並出示任何消費金額之機印發票，可享一小時免費泊車優惠 (由每天早上10時至晚上10時)

 

*優惠祇適用於私家車，不可以與其他形式的泊車優惠同時使用

*優惠受條款及細則約束 

 



停車場使用者受地契及／或大厦公契條款約束, 詳情請參閱個別停車場入口所展示的各項泊車條款及其後之變更。

*顾客参加本商场消费泊车优惠满指定金额，其中一张消费单据由商场内任何一所食肆签发，即可享额外2小时免费泊车优惠

parkingInfoList.promotionPrivilegeDescriptionEn:
From Monday to Sunday, from 10:00 am to 9:30 pm (according to vehicle entry time), "Link Up" members can enjoy 1 hour free parking by using at most 2 machine printed receipt from shopping centre and or wet market (if applicable) with total spending of $200 or more at the related Car Parks. (*Shopper must present member ID in "Link UP" Apps to enjoy the above offer)

*The offer is eligible for private cars only, cannot be used together with other privilege
*Customer is required to present the original cardholder copy of electronic payment (including EPS, credit card, Octopus & etc) receipts
*Free parking is extended for 2 extra hour for hourly patrons who are eligible for our free parking program by spending up to a designated amount provided that one of the receipts presented is issued by any food and beverage tenants of the Shopping Mall
*Subject to the terms and conditions

"EV Park" Electric Vehicle Free Parking Privilege

 

Registered EV shall enjoy free parking privilege for the particular EV at certain participating car parks upon any amount of spending with machine-printed receipt under the portfolio of Link, from 10am to 10pm daily.



*The offer is eligible for private cars only, cannot be used together with other privilege
*Subject to the terms and conditions


The car parks are subject to user restrictions under the relevant government lease and / or deed of mutual covenants, for details, please observe the conditions of parking and any changes or additions thereto imposed from time to time displayed at the entrance of the relevant car park.
parkingInfoList.promotionPrivilegeDescriptionTc:
逢星期一至日，早上10時至晚上9時半（以入車時間計算），「Link Up」會員憑商場或街市(如適用)發出之即日機印發票最多2張並購物消費滿$200或以上，即可享有1小時免費泊車優惠。(*必須出示『Link UP』應用程式中的會員編號，方可享以上優惠)

*優惠祇適用於私家車，不可以與其他形式的泊車優惠同時使用
*顧客必須出示相關之電子貨幣〈包括易辦事、信用卡、八達通等〉付款存根正本〈持卡人存根〉
*顧客參加本商場消費泊車優惠滿指定金額，其中一張消費單據由商場內任何一所食肆簽發，即可享額外2小時免費泊車優惠
*受條款及細則限制

 

「EV泊」電動車免費泊車優惠

 

成功申請者駕駛已登記本優惠之電動車進入領展旗下參與停車場，並出示任何消費金額之機印發票，可享一小時免費泊車優惠 (由每天早上10時至晚上10時)

 

*優惠祇適用於私家車，不可以與其他形式的泊車優惠同時使用

*優惠受條款及細則約束 



停車場使用者受地契及／或大厦公契條款約束, 詳情請參閱個別停車場入口所展示的各項泊車條款及其後之變更。
parkingInfoList.promotionPrivilegeDescriptionSc:
逢星期一至日，早上10时至晚上9时半（以入车时间计算），「Link Up」会员凭商场或街市(如适用)发出之即日机印发票最多2张并购物消费满$200或以上，即可享有1小时免费泊车优惠。(*必须出示『Link UP』应用程式中的会员编号，方可享以上优惠)

*优惠只适用於私家车，不可以与其他形式的泊车优惠同时使用
*顾客必须出示相关之电子货币〈包括易办事、信用卡、八达通等〉付款存根正本〈持卡人存根〉
*顾客参加本商场消费泊车优惠满指定金额，其中一张消费单据由商场内任何一所食肆签发，即可享额外2小时免费泊车优惠
*受条款及细则限制

 

「EV泊」电动车免费泊车优惠

成功申请者驾驶已登记本优惠之电动车进入领展旗下参与停车场，并出示任何消费金额之机印发票，可享一小时免费泊车优惠 (由每天早上10时至晚上10时)

 

*优惠只适用於私家车，不可以与其他形式的泊车优惠同时使用
*受条款及细则限制



停车场使用者受地契及／或大厦公契条款约束, 详情请参阅个别停车场入口所展示的各项泊车条款及其後之变更。

Items.descriptionTitleEn: "Conveniently located by the Chung Fu light rail stop, T Town attracts nearby residents as well as visitors to several of Hong Kong’s most precious nature preserves, the Hong Kong Wetland Park."
Items.descriptionTitleTc: "T Town 坐落於輕鐵頌富站旁，位置優越，交通便利，街坊顧客多之餘，亦吸引了香港濕地公園（香港大自然保護區的一塊瑰寶）的遊客慕名而來。"
Items.descriptionTitleSc: "T Town 坐落於轻铁颂富站旁，位置优越，交通便利，街坊顾客多之余，亦吸引了香港湿地公园（香港大自然保护区的一块瑰宝）的游客慕名而来。"
Items.descriptionContentEn: Inside the beautiful sky-lit atrium, the new escalators for brings greater convenience and easy access to our customers. With retail shopping and dining space as well as easy access to a fresh food market, T Town offers an exciting mix of shops and restaurants. For shoppers’ convenience, there are 1,177 parking spaces.
Items.descriptionContentTc: 商場增設了配有華麗天窗的氣派中庭和嶄新的扶手電梯，令顧客上落樓層倍感方便。廣場設有多家店鋪和餐廳，更可輕鬆直達新鮮食品市場。T Town 匯聚了多間特色店鋪和優質食府，並設有1,177 個泊車位，免除顧客搵位泊車之煩惱。
Items.descriptionContentSc: 商场增设了配有华丽天窗的气派中庭和崭新的扶手电梯，令顾客上落楼层倍感方便。广场设有多家店铺和餐厅，更可轻松直达新鲜食品市场。T Town 汇聚了多间特色店铺和优质食府，并设有1,177 个泊车位，免除顾客搵位泊车之烦恼。

parkingInfoList.promotionPrivilegeDescriptionEn:
From Monday to Sunday, from 10:00 am to 9:30 pm (according to vehicle entry time), "Link Up" members can enjoy 2 hour free parking by using at most 3 machine printed receipt from shopping centre and or wet market (if applicable) with total spending of $300 or more at the related Car Parks. (*Shopper must present member ID in "Link UP" Apps to enjoy the above offer)

*The offer is eligible for private cars only, cannot be used together with other privilege
*Customer is required to present the original cardholder copy of electronic payment (including EPS, credit card, Octopus & etc) receipts
*Free parking is extended for 2 extra hour for hourly patrons who are eligible for our free parking program by spending up to a designated amount provided that one of the receipts presented is issued by any food and beverage tenants of the Shopping Mall
*Subject to the terms and conditions
(Shoppers may as well choose to park in Tin Yuet Estate car park)

The car parks are subject to user restrictions under the relevant government lease and / or deed of mutual covenants, for details, please observe the conditions of parking and any changes or additions thereto imposed from time to time displayed at the entrance of the relevant car park.
parkingInfoList.promotionPrivilegeDescriptionTc:
逢星期一至日，早上10時至晚上9時半（以入車時間計算），「Link Up」會員憑商場或街市(如適用)發出之即日機印發票最多3張並購物消費滿$300或以上，即可享有2小時免費泊車優惠。(*必須出示『Link UP』應用程式中的會員編號，方可享以上優惠)

*優惠祇適用於私家車，不可以與其他形式的泊車優惠同時使用
*顧客必須出示相關之電子貨幣〈包括易辦事、信用卡、八達通等〉付款存根正本〈持卡人存根〉
*顧客參加本商場消費泊車優惠滿指定金額，其中一張消費單據由商場內任何一所食肆簽發，即可享額外2小時免費泊車優惠
*受條款及細則限制
(顧客可選擇泊於天悅邨停車場)

停車場使用者受地契及／或大厦公契條款約束, 詳情請參閱個別停車場入口所展示的各項泊車條款及其後之變更。

*顾客参加本商场消费泊车优惠满指定金额，其中一张消费单据由商场内任何一所食肆签发，即可享额外2小时免费泊车优惠

Items.descriptionContentEn: Following a facelift, Tsing Yi's Cheung Fat Plaza now offers a lively shopping experience. A "Food City" along with shops, restaurants, and service providers fill the spacious and bright shopping centre. The revamped atrium is often abuzz with exciting promotions. For shoppers’ convenience, there are 590 parking spaces in the parking lot, which is also equipped with an Electric Vehicle Charging System for the convenience of environmentally-conscious drivers. Cheung Fat Plaza is conveniently integrated with a public transport interchange, fresh food market, and other shops in Cheung Fat Estate.
Items.descriptionContentTc: 經過優化工程，位於青衣的長發廣場打造了全新的「美食城」，引入多間商鋪、餐廳和各類服務，為顧客提供更全面的購物體驗。商場翻新後的中庭變得舒適美觀，更經常有精彩的推廣展銷活動舉行。停車場內設有590個車位，亦有電動車充電站，供愛環保的車主使用。長發廣場連接公共交通轉乘站，往來鮮活街市和長發邨其它店鋪亦十分方便，可說是四通八達。
Items.descriptionContentSc: 经过优化工程，位於青衣的长发广场打造了全新的「美食城」，引入多间商铺、餐厅和各类服务，为顾客提供更全面的购物体验。商场翻新後的中庭变得舒适美观，更经常有精彩的推广展销活动举行。停车场内设有590个车位，亦有电动车充电站，供爱环保的车主使用。长发广场连接公共交通转乘站，往来鲜活街市和长发邨其它店铺亦十分方便，可说是四通八达。
Items.addressEn: Cheung Fat Plaza, 6 Tam Kon Shan Road, Tsing Yi,  New Territories

Items.descriptionContentEn:
Tsz Wan Shan Shopping Centre is centrally situated for nearby residents of Tsz Wan Shan Estate and other residential developments. Offering a covered public transportation hub on Wai Wah Street with buses, red and green minibuses, the shopping centre is convenient to get and offers a one-stop-shop for daily groceries and necessities with its covered access to not just one, but two, fresh food markets - Tsz Wan Shan Market and Lucky Market.

Link’s first asset enhancement project, Tsz Wan Shan Shopping Centre’s transformation has proven a success with visitors. The mix of shops and restaurants has expanded to include services such as a medical zone, adding to residents‘ conveniece. In addition to Jusco Living Plaza, shops cater to every other need from personal care to fashion & sportswear to jewelry and electronics. The many Chinese and other restaurants make the shopping centre a dining destination for family meals or a quick & easy eating options
Items.descriptionContentTc: 慈雲山中心鄰近慈雲山邨及其它住宅區，連接位處惠華街的有蓋巴士及紅綠小巴站，可說是公共交通工具的交匯點。廣場四通八達，為顧客提供一站式的購物體驗，所有的日常用品或食材都可經有蓋的通道往兩大鮮活街市﹣﹣慈雲山中心街市及好運街市購買，對分秒必爭的香港人來說，就更快捷方便了。慈雲山作為領展首個資產提升的項目，可說是十分成功。商店食肆的種類增加，如新建的匯診中心，亦為顧客帶來更多的選擇。除了Jusco Living Plaza，商場內的商店可以滿足您所有的需要，從個人護理到時裝及運動服，珠寶到電子產品，一應俱全。
Items.descriptionContentSc: 慈云山中心邻近慈云山邨及其它住宅区，连接位处惠华街的有盖巴士及红绿小巴站，可说是公共交通工具的交汇点。广场四通八达，为顾客提供一站式的购物体验，所有的日常用品或食材都可经有盖的通道往两大鲜活街市﹣﹣慈云山中心街市及好运街市购买，对分秒必争的香港人来说，就更快捷方便了。慈云山作为领展首个资产提升的项目，可说是十分成功。商店食肆的种类增加，如新建的汇诊中心，亦为顾客带来更多的选择。除了Jusco Living Plaza，商场内的商店可以满足您所有的需要，从个人护理到时装及运动服，珠宝到电子产品，一应俱全。

parkingInfoList.promotionPrivilegeDescriptionEn:
"From Monday to Sunday, from 10:00 am to 9:30 pm (according to vehicle entry time), "Link Up" members shoppers can enjoy 2 hour free parking by using at most 3 machine printed receipt with total spending of $300 from shopping centre and or wet market (if applicable) at the related Car Parks. (*Shopper must present member ID in "Link UP" Apps to enjoy the above offer)

*The offer is eligible for private cars only, cannot be used together with other privilege
*Customer is required to present the original cardholder copy of electronic payment (including EPS, credit card, Octopus & etc) receipts
*Free parking is extended for 2 extra hour for hourly patrons who are eligible for our free parking program by spending up to a designated amount provided that one of the receipts presented is issued by any food and beverage tenants of the Shopping Mall
*Subject to the terms and conditions

 

"EV Park" Electric Vehicle Free Parking Privilege

 

Registered EV shall enjoy free parking privilege for the particular EV at certain participating car parks upon any amount of spending with machine-printed receipt under the portfolio of Link, from 10am to 10pm daily.



*The offer is eligible for private cars only, cannot be used together with other privilege
*Subject to the terms and conditions



The car parks are subject to user restrictions under the relevant government lease and / or deed of mutual covenants, for details, please observe the conditions of parking and any changes or additions thereto imposed from time to time displayed at the entrance of the relevant car park."

Items.descriptionContentEn: Tai Yuen Commercial Centre encompasses Tai Yuen Market, one of the major fresh markets in Tai Po dating back to the completion of Tai Po’s first public housing estate in 1980. Since it was completely revamped and reopened at the end of 2011, the market has become the crowning gem of Tai Yuen Commercial Centre. The clean and pleasant shopping environment provides nearby residents a convenient and hygienic one-stop, fresh and cooked food market experience. It contains 51 fresh food stalls as well as a market podium of 12 restaurants. In 2011, the Asian Institute of Management awarded Link the Environment Excellence Award for Tai Yuen Market’s successful revitalization.
Items.descriptionContentTc: 在1980年大埔第一個公共屋邨建成時，大元商場內的大元街市已是大埔區內主要的鮮活街市之一。街市在2011年底完成全面翻新並正式重新投入服務，成為大元商場的最大賣點 。顧客前來鮮活街市購買新鮮食材，同時享受既舒適又方便的購物新體驗。街市內有51個攤檔，售賣各類新鮮食材，而商場平台則有12間食肆為顧客提供各式美食。領展於2011年榮獲由亞洲管理學會主辦的亞洲企業社會責任獎之「卓越環保大獎」，印證大元街市進行的優化工程的成功及與時並進的精神，為顧客必然之選。
Items.descriptionContentSc: 在1980年大埔第一个公共屋邨建成时，大元商场内的大元街市已是大埔区内主要的鲜活街市之一。街市在2011年底完成全面翻新并正式重新投入服务，成为大元商场的最大卖点 。顾客前来鲜活街市购买新鲜食材，同时享受既舒适又方便的购物新体验。街市内有51个摊档，售卖各类新鲜食材，而商场平台则有12间食肆为顾客提供各式美食。领展於2011年荣获由亚洲管理学会主办的亚洲企业社会责任奖之「卓越环保大奖」，印证大元街市进行的优化工程的成功及与时并进的精神，为顾客必然之选。
Items.addressEn: Tai Yuen Commercial Centre, 10 Ting Kok Road, Tai Po,  New Territories

Shopping Offer
From Monday to Sunday, from 10:00 am to 9:30 pm (according to vehicle entry time), "Link Up" members can enjoy 1 hour free parking by using at most 2 machine printed receipt from shopping centre and or wet market (if applicable) with total spending of $200 or more at the related Car Parks. (*Shopper must present member ID in "Link UP" Apps to enjoy the above offer)

*Free parking is extended for 2 extra hour for hourly patrons who are eligible for our free parking program by spending up to a designated amount provided that one of the receipts presented is issued by any food and beverage tenants of the Shopping Mall.


*The offer is eligible for private cars only, cannot be used together with other privilege
*Customer is required to present the original cardholder copy of electronic payment (including EPS, credit card, Octopus & etc) receipts
*Subject to the terms and conditions

"EV Park" Electric Vehicle Free Parking Privilege

 

Registered EV shall enjoy free parking privilege for the particular EV at certain participating car parks upon any amount of spending with machine-printed receipt under the portfolio of Link, from 10am to 10pm daily.



*The offer is eligible for private cars only, cannot be used together with other privilege
*Subject to the terms and conditions


The car parks are subject to user restrictions under the relevant government lease and / or deed of mutual covenants, for details, please observe the conditions of parking and any changes or additions thereto imposed from time to time displayed at the entrance of the relevant car park.

parkingInfoList.promotionPrivilegeDescriptionEn:
Shopping Offer
From Monday to Sunday, from 10:00 am to 9:30 pm (according to vehicle entry time), "Link Up" members can enjoy 1 hour free parking by using at most 2 machine printed receipt from shopping centre and or wet market (if applicable) with total spending of $200 or more at the related Car Parks. (*Shopper must present member ID in "Link UP" Apps to enjoy the above offer)

*Free parking is extended for 2 extra hour for hourly patrons who are eligible for our free parking program by spending up to a designated amount provided that one of the receipts presented is issued by any food and beverage tenants of the Shopping Mall.


*The offer is eligible for private cars only, cannot be used together with other privilege
*Customer is required to present the original cardholder copy of electronic payment (including EPS, credit card, Octopus & etc) receipts
*Subject to the terms and conditions

 

"EV Park" Electric Vehicle Free Parking Privilege

 

Registered EV shall enjoy free parking privilege for the particular EV at certain participating car parks upon any amount of spending with machine-printed receipt under the portfolio of Link, from 10am to 10pm daily.



*The offer is eligible for private cars only, cannot be used together with other privilege
*Subject to the terms and conditions


The car parks are subject to user restrictions under the relevant government lease and / or deed of mutual covenants, for details, please observe the conditions of parking and any changes or additions thereto imposed from time to time displayed at the entrance of the relevant car park.
parkingInfoList.promotionPrivilegeDescriptionTc:
購物消費優惠
逢星期一至日，早上10時至晚上9時半 （以入車時間計算），「Link Up」會員憑商場或街市(如適用)發出之即日機印發票最多2張並購物消費滿$200或以上，即可享有1小時免費泊車優惠。(*必須出示『Link UP』應用程式中的會員編號，方可享以上優惠)

*顧客參加本商場消費泊車優惠滿指定金額，其中一張消費單據由商場內任何一所食肆簽發，即可享額外2小時免費泊車優惠

*優惠祇適用於私家車，不可以與其他形式的泊車優惠同時使用
*顧客必須出示相關之電子貨幣〈包括易辦事、信用卡、八達通等〉付款存根正本〈持卡人存根〉
*受條款及細則限制

 

「EV泊」電動車免費泊車優惠

 

成功申請者駕駛已登記本優惠之電動車進入領展旗下參與停車場，並出示任何消費金額之機印發票，可享一小時免費泊車優惠 (由每天早上10時至晚上10時)

 

*優惠祇適用於私家車，不可以與其他形式的泊車優惠同時使用

*優惠受條款及細則約束 



停車場使用者受地契及／或大厦公契條款約束, 詳情請參閱個別停車場入口所展示的各項泊車條款及其後之變更。
parkingInfoList.promotionPrivilegeDescriptionSc:
购物消费优惠
逢星期一至日，早上10时至晚上9时半 （以入车时间计算），「Link Up」会员凭商场或街市(如适用)发出之即日机印发票最多2张并购物消费满$200或以上，即可享有1小时免费泊车优惠。(*必须出示『Link UP』应用程式中的会员编号，方可享以上优惠)

*顾客参加本商场消费泊车优惠满指定金额，其中一张消费单据由商场内任何一所食肆签发，即可享额外2小时免费泊车优惠

*优惠只适用於私家车，不可以与其他形式的泊车优惠同时使用
*顾客必须出示相关之电子货币〈包括易办事、信用卡、八达通等〉付款存根正本〈持卡人存根〉
*受条款及细则限制

成功申请者驾驶已登记本优惠之电动车进入领展旗下参与停车场，并出示任何消费金额之机印发票，可享一小时免费泊车优惠 (由每天早上10时至晚上10时)

 

*优惠只适用於私家车，不可以与其他形式的泊车优惠同时使用
*受条款及细则限制

Items.descriptionTitleEn: "Connected to the Hang Hau MTR station, TKO Gateway is neighborhood hub and magnet for Tseung Kwan O's residents."
Items.descriptionTitleTc: "連接坑口地鐵站，TKO Gateway 是將軍澳居民的消閒聚腳點。"
Items.descriptionTitleSc: "连接坑口地铁站，TKO Gateway 是将军澳居民的消闲聚脚点。"
Items.descriptionContentEn: With retail shopping and dining space as well as easy access to a fresh food market. TKO Gateway is accessible to a public transport hub, while those arriving by car can take advantage of the parking lot’s 623 parking spaces.
Items.descriptionContentTc: 商場包括零售店鋪及餐廳食肆，前往鮮活街市亦十分方便。TKO Gateway四通八達，鄰近公共交通工具，而駕車人士則可使用商場提供的623個車位。
Items.descriptionContentSc: 商场包括零售店铺及餐厅食肆，前往鲜活街市亦十分方便。经行人天桥步行前来的顾客会被一阵阵咖啡香吸引，因商场在天桥上巧妙的设置咖啡店，让日常繁忙的您可以轻松一下。TKO Gateway四通八达，邻近公共交通工具，而驾车人士则可使用商场提供的623个车位。
Items.addressEn: TKO Gateway, 2 Sheung Ning Road, Tseung Kwan O,  New Territories
Items.addressTc: 新界將軍澳常寧路2號TKO Gateway
Items.addressSc: 新界将军澳常宁路2号TKO Gateway

parkingInfoList.addressEn: TKO Gateway, 2 Sheung Ning Road, Tseung Kwan O,  New Territories
parkingInfoList.addressTc: 新界將軍澳常寧路2號TKO Gateway
parkingInfoList.addressSc: 新界将军澳常宁路2号TKO Gateway
parkingInfoList.promotionPrivilegeDescriptionEn:
From Monday to Sunday, from 10:00 am to 9:30 pm (according to vehicle entry time), "Link Up" members can enjoy 2 hour free parking by using at most 2 machine printed receipt from shopping centre and or wet market (if applicable) with total spending of $200 or more at the related Car Parks, while "Link Up" members can enjoy 2 hours free parking by using at most 3 machine printed receipts from shopping centre and or wet market (if applicable) with total spending of $400 or more. (*Shopper must present member ID in "Link UP" Apps to enjoy the above offer)

*The offer is eligible for private cars only, cannot be used together with other privilege
*Customer is required to present the original cardholder copy of electronic payment (including EPS, credit card, Octopus & etc) receipts
*Free parking is extended for 2 extra hour for hourly patrons who are eligible for our free parking program by spending up to a designated amount provided that one of the receipts presented is issued by any food and beverage tenants of the Shopping Mall
*Subject to the terms and conditions


The car parks are subject to user restrictions under the relevant government lease and / or deed of mutual covenants, for details, please observe the conditions of parking and any changes or additions thereto imposed from time to time displayed at the entrance of the relevant car park.
parkingInfoList.promotionPrivilegeDescriptionTc:
逢星期一至日，早上10時至晚上9時半（以入車時間計算），「Link Up」會員憑商場或街市(如適用)發出之即日機印發票最多2張並購物消費滿$200或以上，即可享有2小時免費泊車優惠；「Link Up」會員憑商場及或街市商戶(如適用)發出之即日機印發票最多3張並購物消費滿$400或以上，即可享有2小時免費泊車優惠。(*必須出示『Link UP』應用程式中的會員編號，方可享以上優惠)

*優惠祇適用於私家車，不可以與其他形式的泊車優惠同時使用
*顧客必須出示相關之電子貨幣〈包括易辦事、信用卡、八達通等〉付款存根正本〈持卡人存根〉
*顧客參加本商場消費泊車優惠滿指定金額，其中一張消費單據由商場內任何一所食肆簽發，即可享額外2小時免費泊車優惠
*受條款及細則限制


停車場使用者受地契及／或大厦公契條款約束, 詳情請參閱個別停車場入口所展示的各項泊車條款及其後之變更。
parkingInfoList.promotionPrivilegeDescriptionSc:
逢星期一至日，早上10时至晚上9时半（以入车时间计算），「Link Up」会员凭商场或街市(如适用)发出之即日机印发票最多2张并购物消费满$200或以上，即可享有2小时免费泊车优惠；「Link Up」会员凭商场及或街市商户(如适用)发出之即日机印发票最多3张并购物消费满$400或以上，即可享有2小时免费泊车优惠。(*必须出示『Link UP』应用程式中的会员编号，方可享以上优惠)

*优惠只适用於私家车，不可以与其他形式的泊车优惠同时使用
*顾客必须出示相关之电子货币〈包括易办事、信用卡、八达通等〉付款存根正本〈持卡人存根〉
*顾客参加本商场消费泊车优惠满指定金额，其中一张消费单据由商场内任何一所食肆签发，即可享额外2小时免费泊车优惠
*受条款及细则限制


停车场使用者受地契及／或大厦公契条款约束, 详情请参阅个别停车场入口所展示的各项泊车条款及其後之变更。

parkingInfoList.promotionPrivilegeDescriptionEn:
From Monday to Sunday, from 10:00 am to 9:30 pm (according to vehicle entry time), "Link Up" members can enjoy 2 hour free parking by using at most 3 machine printed receipt from shopping centre and or wet market (if applicable) with total spending of $300 or more at the related Car Parks. (*Shopper must present member ID in "Link UP" Apps to enjoy the above offer)

*The offer is eligible for private cars only, cannot be used together with other privilege
*Customer is required to present the original cardholder copy of electronic payment (including EPS, credit card, Octopus & etc) receipts
*Free parking is extended for 2 extra hour for hourly patrons who are eligible for our free parking program by spending up to a designated amount provided that one of the receipts presented is issued by any food and beverage tenants of the Shopping Mall
*Subject to the terms and conditions


"EV Park" Electric Vehicle Free Parking Privilege

 

Registered EV shall enjoy free parking privilege for the particular EV at certain participating car parks upon any amount of spending with machine-printed receipt under the portfolio of Link, from 10am to 10pm daily.



*The offer is eligible for private cars only, cannot be used together with other privilege
*Subject to the terms and conditions

 

The car parks are subject to user restrictions under the relevant government lease and / or deed of mutual covenants, for details, please observe the conditions of parking and any changes or additions thereto imposed from time to time displayed at the entrance of the relevant car park.
parkingInfoList.promotionPrivilegeDescriptionTc:
逢星期一至日，早上10時至晚上9時半（以入車時間計算），「Link Up」會員憑商場或街市(如適用)發出之即日機印發票最多3張並購物消費滿$300或以上，即可享有2小時免費泊車優惠。(*必須出示『Link UP』應用程式中的會員編號，方可享以上優惠)

*優惠祇適用於私家車，不可以與其他形式的泊車優惠同時使用
*顧客必須出示相關之電子貨幣〈包括易辦事、信用卡、八達通等〉付款存根正本〈持卡人存根〉
*顧客參加本商場消費泊車優惠滿指定金額，其中一張消費單據由商場內任何一所食肆簽發，即可享額外2小時免費泊車優惠
*受條款及細則限制


「EV泊」電動車免費泊車優惠

 

成功申請者駕駛已登記本優惠之電動車進入領展旗下參與停車場，並出示任何消費金額之機印發票，可享一小時免費泊車優惠 (由每天早上10時至晚上10時)

 

*優惠祇適用於私家車，不可以與其他形式的泊車優惠同時使用

*優惠受條款及細則約束 

 

停車場使用者受地契及／或大厦公契條款約束, 詳情請參閱個別停車場入口所展示的各項泊車條款及其後之變更。
parkingInfoList.promotionPrivilegeDescriptionSc:
逢星期一至日，早上10时至晚上9时半（以入车时间计算），「Link Up」会员凭商场或街市(如适用)发出之即日机印发票最多3张并购物消费满$300或以上，即可享有2小时免费泊车优惠。(*必须出示『Link UP』应用程式中的会员编号，方可享以上优惠)

*优惠只适用於私家车，不可以与其他形式的泊车优惠同时使用
*顾客必须出示相关之电子货币〈包括易办事、信用卡、八达通等〉付款存根正本〈持卡人存根〉
*顾客参加本商场消费泊车优惠满指定金额，其中一张消费单据由商场内任何一所食肆签发，即可享额外2小时免费泊车优惠
*受条款及细则限制

「EV泊」电动车免费泊车优惠

 

成功申请者驾驶已登记本优惠之电动车进入领展旗下参与停车场，并出示任何消费金额之机印发票，可享一小时免费泊车优惠 (由每天早上10时至晚上10时)

 

*优惠只适用於私家车，不可以与其他形式的泊车优惠同时使用
*受条款及细则限制


停车场使用者受地契及／或大厦公契条款约束, 详情请参阅个别停车场入口所展示的各项泊车条款及其後之变更。

Items.descriptionContentEn:
Conveniently located near Yau Tong MTR station, Lei Yue Mun Plaza attracts residents of nearby Yau Tong Estate, Yau Mei Court and Ko Cheung Court as well as the area’s other residents. With shops, restaurants, supermarkets, fresh market and a vast array of other services, Lei Yue Mun Plaza fulfills every need. 

Lei Yue Mun Plaza offers a comfortable shopping experience. Its skylights bathe the shopping centre in soothing natural light. There is a two-story high atrium, which offers ample open space for exciting events and promotions.
Items.descriptionContentTc:
坐落在油塘地鐵站旁，鯉魚門商場為油塘邨、油美苑、高翔苑和區內的居民提供一站式購物消閒選擇。內設商店、食肆、超級市場、街市和其它服務，滿足您的日常需要。

鯉魚門商場裝有氣派天窗，帶來明媚的自然陽光，透射商場每一角落，搭配兩層高的雅緻中庭，為未來的活動及宣傳提供充裕空間。
Items.descriptionContentSc:
坐落在油塘地铁站旁，鲤鱼门商场为油塘邨、油美苑、高翔苑和区内的居民提供一站式购物消闲选择。内设商店、食肆、超级市场、街市和其它服务，满足您的日常需要。

鲤鱼门商场装有气派天窗，带来明媚的自然阳光，透射商场每一角落，搭配两层高的雅致中庭，为未来的活动及宣传提供充裕空间。

parkingInfoList.promotionPrivilegeDescriptionEn:
From Monday to Sunday, from 10:00 am to 9:30 pm (according to vehicle entry time), shoppers can enjoy 1 hour free parking by using at most 2 machine printed receipt from shopping centre and or wet market (if applicable) with total spending of $200 or more at the related Car Parks.


*The offer is eligible for private cars only, cannot be used together with other privilege
*Customer is required to present the original cardholder copy of electronic payment (including EPS, credit card and Octopus) receipts
*Subject to the terms and conditions


The car parks are subject to user restrictions under the relevant government lease and / or deed of mutual covenants, for details, please observe the conditions of parking and any changes or additions thereto imposed from time to time displayed at the entrance of the relevant car park.
parkingInfoList.promotionPrivilegeDescriptionTc:
逢星期一至日，早上10時至晚上9時半（以入車時間計算），憑商場或街市(如適用)發出之即日機印發票最多2張並購物消費滿$200或以上，即可享有1小時免費泊車優惠。


*優惠祇適用於私家車，不可以與其他形式的泊車優惠同時使用
*顧客必須出示相關之電子貨幣〈包括易辦事、信用卡及八達通〉付款存根正本〈持卡人存根〉
*受條款及細則限制


停車場使用者受地契及／或大厦公契條款約束, 詳情請參閱個別停車場入口所展示的各項泊車條款及其後之變更。
parkingInfoList.promotionPrivilegeDescriptionSc:
逢星期一至日，早上10时至晚上9时半（以入车时间计算），凭商场或街市(如适用)发出之即日机印发票最多2张并购物消费满$200或以上，即可享有1小时免费泊车优惠。


*优惠只适用於私家车，不可以与其他形式的泊车优惠同时使用
*顾客必须出示相关之电子货币〈包括易办事、信用卡及八达通〉付款存根正本〈持卡人存根〉
*受条款及细则限制


停车场使用者受地契及／或大厦公契条款约束, 详情请参阅个别停车场入口所展示的各项泊车条款及其後之变更。

parkingInfoList.promotionPrivilegeDescriptionEn:
From Monday to Sunday, from 10:00 am to 9:30 pm (according to vehicle entry time), "Link Up" members can enjoy 1 hour free parking by using at most 2 machine printed receipt from shopping centre and or wet market (if applicable) with total spending of $200 or more at the related Car Parks. (*Shopper must present member ID in "Link UP" Apps to enjoy the above offer)

*The offer is eligible for private cars only, cannot be used together with other privilege
*Customer is required to present the original cardholder copy of electronic payment (including EPS, credit card, Octopus & etc) receipts
*Free parking is extended for 2 extra hour for hourly patrons who are eligible for our free parking program by spending up to a designated amount provided that one of the receipts presented is issued by any food and beverage tenants of the Shopping Mall
*Subject to the terms and conditions

"EV Park" Electric Vehicle Free Parking Privilege

 

Registered EV shall enjoy free parking privilege for the particular EV at certain participating car parks upon any amount of spending with machine-printed receipt under the portfolio of Link, from 10am to 10pm daily.



*The offer is eligible for private cars only, cannot be used together with other privilege
*Subject to the terms and conditions


The car parks are subject to user restrictions under the relevant government lease and / or deed of mutual covenants, for details, please observe the conditions of parking and any changes or additions thereto imposed from time to time displayed at the entrance of the relevant car park.
parkingInfoList.promotionPrivilegeDescriptionTc:
逢星期一至日，早上10時至晚上9時半（以入車時間計算），「Link Up」會員憑商場或街市(如適用)發出之即日機印發票最多2張並購物消費滿$200或以上，即可享有1小時免費泊車優惠。(*必須出示『Link UP』應用程式中的會員編號，方可享以上優惠)

*優惠祇適用於私家車，不可以與其他形式的泊車優惠同時使用
*顧客必須出示相關之電子貨幣〈包括易辦事、信用卡、八達通等〉付款存根正本〈持卡人存根〉
*顧客參加本商場消費泊車優惠滿指定金額，其中一張消費單據由商場內任何一所食肆簽發，即可享額外2小時免費泊車優惠
*受條款及細則限制

 

「EV泊」電動車免費泊車優惠

 

成功申請者駕駛已登記本優惠之電動車進入領展旗下參與停車場，並出示任何消費金額之機印發票，可享一小時免費泊車優惠 (由每天早上10時至晚上10時)

 

*優惠祇適用於私家車，不可以與其他形式的泊車優惠同時使用

*優惠受條款及細則約束 



停車場使用者受地契及／或大厦公契條款約束, 詳情請參閱個別停車場入口所展示的各項泊車條款及其後之變更。
parkingInfoList.promotionPrivilegeDescriptionSc:
逢星期一至日，早上10时至晚上9时半（以入车时间计算），「Link Up」会员凭商场或街市(如适用)发出之即日机印发票最多2张并购物消费满$200或以上，即可享有1小时免费泊车优惠。(*必须出示『Link UP』应用程式中的会员编号，方可享以上优惠)

*优惠只适用於私家车，不可以与其他形式的泊车优惠同时使用
*顾客必须出示相关之电子货币〈包括易办事、信用卡、八达通等〉付款存根正本〈持卡人存根〉
*顾客参加本商场消费泊车优惠满指定金额，其中一张消费单据由商场内任何一所食肆签发，即可享额外2小时免费泊车优惠
*受条款及细则限制

「EV泊」电动车免费泊车优惠

成功申请者驾驶已登记本优惠之电动车进入领展旗下参与停车场，并出示任何消费金额之机印发票，可享一小时免费泊车优惠 (由每天早上10时至晚上10时)

 

*优惠只适用於私家车，不可以与其他形式的泊车优惠同时使用
*受条款及细则限制


停车场使用者受地契及／或大厦公契条款约束, 详情请参阅个别停车场入口所展示的各项泊车条款及其後之变更。

parkingInfoList.promotionPrivilegeDescriptionEn:
"From Monday to Sunday, from 10:00 am to 9:30 pm (according to vehicle entry time), "Link Up" members can enjoy 2 hour free parking by using at most 3 machine printed receipts from Kai Tin shopping centre and or wet market (if applicable) with total spending of $300 or more. (*Shopper must present member ID in "Link UP" Apps to enjoy the above offer)

*Ping Tin Phase 2 Car Park is not applicable
*The offer is eligible for private cars only, cannot be used together with other privilege
*Customer is required to present the original cardholder copy of electronic payment (including EPS, credit card, Octopus & etc) receipts
*Free parking is extended for 2 extra hour for hourly patrons who are eligible for our free parking program by spending up to a designated amount provided that one of the receipts presented is issued by any food and beverage tenants of the Shopping Mall
*Subject to the terms and conditions

 

"EV Park" Electric Vehicle Free Parking Privilege

 

Registered EV shall enjoy free parking privilege for the particular EV at certain participating car parks upon any amount of spending with machine-printed receipt under the portfolio of Link, from 10am to 10pm daily.



*The offer is eligible for private cars only, cannot be used together with other privilege
*Subject to the terms and conditions



The car parks are subject to user restrictions under the relevant government lease and / or deed of mutual covenants, for details, please observe the conditions of parking and any changes or additions thereto imposed from time to time displayed at the entrance of the relevant car park."
parkingInfoList.promotionPrivilegeDescriptionTc:
"逢星期一至日，早上10時至晚上9時半（以入車時間計算），「Link Up」會員憑啟田商場或街市(如適用)發出之即日機印發票最多3張並購物消費滿$300或以上，即可享有2小時免費泊車優惠。(*必須出示『Link UP』應用程式中的會員編號，方可享以上優惠)

*平田2期停車場不適用
*優惠祇適用於私家車，不可以與其他形式的泊車優惠同時使用
*顧客必須出示相關之電子貨幣〈包括易辦事、信用卡、八達通等〉付款存根正本〈持卡人存根〉
*顧客參加本商場消費泊車優惠滿指定金額，其中一張消費單據由商場內任何一所食肆簽發，即可享額外2小時免費泊車優惠
*受條款及細則限制

 

「EV泊」電動車免費泊車優惠

 

成功申請者駕駛已登記本優惠之電動車進入領展旗下參與停車場，並出示任何消費金額之機印發票，可享一小時免費泊車優惠 (由每天早上10時至晚上10時)

 

*優惠祇適用於私家車，不可以與其他形式的泊車優惠同時使用

*優惠受條款及細則約束 



停車場使用者受地契及／或大厦公契條款約束, 詳情請參閱個別停車場入口所展示的各項泊車條款及其後之變更。"
parkingInfoList.promotionPrivilegeDescriptionSc:
"逢星期一至日，早上10时至晚上9时半（以入车时间计算），「Link Up」会员凭启田商场或街市(如适用)发出之即日机印发票最多3张并购物消费满$300或以上，即可享有2小时免费泊车优惠。(*必须出示『Link UP』应用程式中的会员编号，方可享以上优惠)

*平田2期停车场不适用
*优惠只适用於私家车，不可以与其他形式的泊车优惠同时使用
*顾客必须出示相关之电子货币〈包括易办事、信用卡、八达通等〉付款存根正本〈持卡人存根〉
*顾客参加本商场消费泊车优惠满指定金额，其中一张消费单据由商场内任何一所食肆签发，即可享额外2小时免费泊车优惠
*受条款及细则限制

 

「EV泊」电动车免费泊车优惠

成功申请者驾驶已登记本优惠之电动车进入领展旗下参与停车场，并出示任何消费金额之机印发票，可享一小时免费泊车优惠 (由每天早上10时至晚上10时)

 

*优惠只适用於私家车，不可以与其他形式的泊车优惠同时使用
*受条款及细则限制



停车场使用者受地契及／或大厦公契条款约束, 详情请参阅个别停车场入口所展示的各项泊车条款及其後之变更。"

parkingInfoList.promotionPrivilegeDescriptionEn:
"From Monday to Sunday, from 10:00 am to 9:30 pm (according to vehicle entry time), "Link Up" members can enjoy 2 hour free parking by using at most 3 machine printed receipt from shopping centre and or wet market (if applicable) with total spending of $300 or more at the related Car Parks. (*Shopper must present member ID in "Link UP" Apps to enjoy the above offer)

*The offer is eligible for private cars only, cannot be used together with other privilege
*Customer is required to present the original cardholder copy of electronic payment (including EPS, credit card, Octopus & etc) receipts
*Free parking is extended for 2 extra hour for hourly patrons who are eligible for our free parking program by spending up to a designated amount provided that one of the receipts presented is issued by any food and beverage tenants of the Shopping Mall
*Subject to the terms and conditions


The car parks are subject to user restrictions under the relevant government lease and / or deed of mutual covenants, for details, please observe the conditions of parking and any changes or additions thereto imposed from time to time displayed at the entrance of the relevant car park."
parkingInfoList.promotionPrivilegeDescriptionTc:
"逢星期一至日，早上10時至晚上9時半（以入車時間計算），「Link Up」會員憑商場或街市(如適用)發出之即日機印發票最多3張並購物消費滿$300或以上，即可享有2小時免費泊車優惠。(*必須出示『Link UP』應用程式中的會員編號，方可享以上優惠)

*優惠祇適用於私家車，不可以與其他形式的泊車優惠同時使用
*顧客必須出示相關之電子貨幣〈包括易辦事、信用卡、八達通等〉付款存根正本〈持卡人存根〉
*顧客參加本商場消費泊車優惠滿指定金額，其中一張消費單據由商場內任何一所食肆簽發，即可享額外2小時免費泊車優惠
*受條款及細則限制


停車場使用者受地契及／或大厦公契條款約束, 詳情請參閱個別停車場入口所展示的各項泊車條款及其後之變更。"
parkingInfoList.promotionPrivilegeDescriptionSc:
"逢星期一至日，早上10时至晚上9时半（以入车时间计算），「Link Up」会员凭商场或街市(如适用)发出之即日机印发票最多3张并购物消费满$300或以上，即可享有2小时免费泊车优惠。(*必须出示『Link UP』应用程式中的会员编号，方可享以上优惠)

*优惠只适用於私家车，不可以与其他形式的泊车优惠同时使用
*顾客必须出示相关之电子货币〈包括易办事、信用卡、八达通等〉付款存根正本〈持卡人存根〉
*顾客参加本商场消费泊车优惠满指定金额，其中一张消费单据由商场内任何一所食肆签发，即可享额外2小时免费泊车优惠
*受条款及细则限制


停车场使用者受地契及／或大厦公契条款约束, 详情请参阅个别停车场入口所展示的各项泊车条款及其後之变更。"

Items.descriptionContentEn: Conveniently connected to the Tung Chung MTR station by footbridge, Fu Tung Plaza attracts nearby residents as well as visitors to Hong Kong’s famous neighboring tourist attractions such as Ngong Ping 360, the Big Buddha and Po Lin Monastery. Fu Tung Plaza’s interiors have been given a lively and contemporary facelift, while the semi-outdoor shops have a relaxed al fresco feeling.. For shoppers’ convenience, there are 537 parking spaces, and the parking lot is equipped with an Electric Vehicle Charging System for the convenience of environmentally-conscious drivers. Fu Tung Plaza is conveniently integrated with the MTR, a public transport interchange, fresh food market, and Tung Chung’s residential area.
Items.descriptionContentTc: 與東涌港鐵站只是一橋之隔，富東廣場是不少附近居民的消費熱點，更吸引大量到訪鄰近景點如昂平360吊車、天壇大佛和寶蓮寺的遊客到來。富東廣場經過大改造後，變得生氣勃勃，富現代感，半室外的店鋪給人置身戶外的閒適感覺。停車場的車位數目達537個，並設有電動車充電站，為支持環保的車主服務。富東廣場交通方便，鄰近港鐵及公共交通轉乘站，與街市和住宅區距離甚近。
Items.descriptionContentSc: 与东涌港铁站只是一桥之隔，富东广场是不少附近居民的消费热点，更吸引大量到访邻近景点如昂平360吊车、天坛大佛和宝莲寺的游客到来。富东广场经过大改造後，变得生气勃勃，富现代感，半室外的店铺给人置身户外的闲适感觉。停车场的车位数目达537个，并设有电动车充电站，为支持环保的车主服务。富东广场交通方便，邻近港铁及公共交通转乘站，与街市和住宅区距离甚近。

parkingInfoList.promotionPrivilegeDescriptionEn:
From Monday to Sunday, from 10:00 am to 9:30 pm (according to vehicle entry time), "Link Up" members can enjoy 1 hour free parking by using at most 2 machine printed receipt from shopping centre and or wet market (if applicable) with total spending of $200 or more at the related Car Parks. (*Shopper must present member ID in "Link UP" Apps to enjoy the above offer)

*Customer is required to present the original cardholder copy of electronic payment (including EPS, credit card, Octopus & etc) receipts
*Free parking is extended for 2 extra hour for hourly patrons who are eligible for our free parking program by spending up to a designated amount provided that one of the receipts presented is issued by any food and beverage tenants of the Shopping Mall

"EV Park" Electric Vehicle Free Parking Privilege

 

Registered EV shall enjoy free parking privilege for the particular EV at certain participating car parks upon any amount of spending with machine-printed receipt under the portfolio of Link, from 10am to 10pm daily.



*The offer is eligible for private cars only, cannot be used together with other privilege
*Subject to the terms and conditions




The car parks are subject to user restrictions under the relevant government lease and / or deed of mutual covenants, for details, please observe the conditions of parking and any changes or additions thereto imposed from time to time displayed at the entrance of the relevant car park.
parkingInfoList.promotionPrivilegeDescriptionTc:
逢星期一至日，早上10時至晚上9時半（以入車時間計算），「Link Up」會員憑商場或街市(如適用)發出之即日機印發票最多2張並購物消費滿$200或以上，即可享有1小時免費泊車優惠。(*必須出示『Link UP』應用程式中的會員編號，方可享以上優惠)

*顧客必須出示相關之電子貨幣〈包括易辦事、信用卡、八達通等〉付款存根正本〈持卡人存根〉
*顧客參加本商場消費泊車優惠滿指定金額，其中一張消費單據由商場內任何一所食肆簽發，即可享額外2小時免費泊車優惠

「EV泊」電動車免費泊車優惠

 

成功申請者駕駛已登記本優惠之電動車進入領展旗下參與停車場，並出示任何消費金額之機印發票，可享一小時免費泊車優惠 (由每天早上10時至晚上10時)

 

*優惠祇適用於私家車，不可以與其他形式的泊車優惠同時使用

*優惠受條款及細則約束

Items.descriptionContentEn:
Located near Lam Tin MTR station, Kai Tin Shopping Centre is a convenient hub for residents of Kai Tin and Ping Tin Estates as well as other nearby residents. With shops, restaurants, supermarkets, fresh market as well as other services, Kai Tin Shopping Centre fulfills every need. For added convenience, there are 460 parking spaces.

Kai Tin Shopping Centre offers an incredibly diverse shopping and dining destination. In addition, it houses all the services residents need in one convenient location.
Items.descriptionContentTc:
鄰近藍田地鐵站的啟田商場，為平田邨和附近私人樓宇，如麗港城、匯景花園的居民提供一站式購物消閒選擇。內設商店、食肆、超級市場、鮮活街市和其它服務，店舖林立，滿足您的日常需要。商場更有460個泊車位，令購物更加方便。

啟田商場位置方便，為居民一站式服務，提供多元化的購物和餐飲選擇。
Items.descriptionContentSc:
邻近蓝田地铁站的启田商场，为平田邨和附近私人楼宇，如丽港城、汇景花园的居民提供一站式购物消闲选择。内设商店、食肆、超级市场、鲜活街市和其它服务，店舖林立，满足您的日常需要。商场更有460个泊车位，令购物更加方便。

启田商场位置方便，为居民一站式服务，提供多元化的购物和餐饮选择。

parkingInfoList.promotionPrivilegeDescriptionEn:
"From Monday to Sunday, from 10:00 am to 9:30 pm (according to vehicle entry time), "Link Up" members shoppers can enjoy 2 hour free parking by using at most 3 machine printed receipt with total spending of $300 from shopping centre and or wet market (if applicable) at the related Car Parks. (*Shopper must present member ID in "Link UP" Apps to enjoy the above offer)

*Customer is required to present the original cardholder copy of electronic payment (including EPS, credit card, Octopus & etc) receipts
*Free parking is extended for 2 extra hour for hourly patrons who are eligible for our free parking program by spending up to a designated amount provided that one of the receipts presented is issued by any food and beverage tenants of the Shopping Mall

MTR Park & Ride Scheme

From Monday to Friday (excluding public holidays), park your car from 6am to 7:29pm (based on entry time) at one of Link’s shopping centre* car parks and then ride the MTR, you can enjoy the Park & Ride offer by getting 1 hour free parking for 3 hours of parking, or 3 hours free parking for 6 hours of parking, or even 7 hours free parking for 10 hours of parking!

How to Redeem: Link’s "Link UP" app user must use the same Octopus card to park your car at a designated Link car park and ride on the MTR, show the proof of any spending in the designated shopping centre, and redeem one of the above free parking offers at customer service desk between 10am and 9:30pm.

*Subject to the terms and conditions

 

"EV Park" Electric Vehicle Free Parking Privilege

 

Registered EV shall enjoy free parking privilege for the particular EV at certain participating car parks upon any amount of spending with machine-printed receipt under the portfolio of Link, from 10am to 10pm daily.



*The offer is eligible for private cars only, cannot be used together with other privilege
*Subject to the terms and conditions


The car parks are subject to user restrictions under the relevant government lease and / or deed of mutual covenants, for details, please observe the conditions of parking and any changes or additions thereto imposed from time to time displayed at the entrance of the relevant car park."
parkingInfoList.promotionPrivilegeDescriptionTc:
"逢星期一至日，早上10時至晚上9時半（以入車時間計算），「Link Up」會員憑商場或街市(如適用)發出之即日機印發票最多3張並購物消費滿 $300或以上，即可享有2小時免費泊車優惠。(*必須出示『Link UP』應用程式中的會員編號，方可享以上優惠)

*顧客必須出示相關之電子貨幣〈包括易辦事、信用卡、八達通等〉付款存根正本〈持卡人存根〉
*顧客參加本商場消費泊車優惠滿指定金額，其中一張消費單據由商場內任何一所食肆簽發，即可享額外2小時免費泊車優惠

「泊車轉乘港鐵優惠」

逢星期一至五（公眾假期除外）早上6時至晚上7時29分（以入車時間計算），顧客於領展商場*停車場泊車後轉乘港鐵，泊車3小時即可享有1小時免費泊車優惠，泊車6小時即可享有3小時免費泊車優惠，泊車10小時更享高達7小時免費泊車優惠。

換領方法：「Link UP」手機程式用戶須使用同一張八達通卡於指定領展停車場泊車後轉乘港鐵，提供指定商場的任何消費證明，便可於當日早上10時至晚上9時30分期間，前往客戶服務台換領免費泊車優惠。

*受條款及細則限制

 

「EV泊」電動車免費泊車優惠

 

成功申請者駕駛已登記本優惠之電動車進入領展旗下參與停車場，並出示任何消費金額之機印發票，可享一小時免費泊車優惠 (由每天早上10時至晚上10時)

 

*優惠祇適用於私家車，不可以與其他形式的泊車優惠同時使用

*優惠受條款及細則約束

换领方法：「Link UP」手机程式用户须使用同一张八达通卡於指定领展停车场泊车後转乘港铁，提供指定商场的任何消费证明，便可於当日早上10时至晚上9时30分期间，前往客户服务台换领免费泊车优惠。
